dcterms:title: 共進上書
dcterms:abstract: ●共進上書昨日共進會에셔 政府에 上書에 如左니伏以左道惑衆은 邦有常刑이온 况以浮誕妖妄之說로 上以壅蔽聰明며 下而流毒生靈者乎아 粤自數十年來로 朝綱이 解弛고 永巷이 多岐야 如卜筮算命祈禳巫覡觀天測地降魔役鬼者流▣因緣椒掖야 乘機躐進일 惟我  皇上陸下 以仁覆無外之德으로 殿陸之下에 物無不容이시니와 而政府諸公은 非徒不能防微杜漸야 設方便而斥遠之라 乃反阿附之며 倀導之야 或換手而盜弄며 或密謀而做事야 以此輩로 爲進身謀私之機關이 鄙夫之事를 無所不至고 及其金盡勢屈則反爲此輩之所噬니 總計所得에 不足以補其所失者ㅣ在在皆然니 諸公之謀ㅣ拙亦甚矣으다 以我  聖上陛下日月之明으로 洞▣此輩之眩惑이 毫無所補於事而徒爲淸朝之累也▣사 每於思治綸音之中에 輒下肅淸宮禁之命시니 諸公이 理應乘▣掃湯야 使妖雲恠霧로 不得復近於瓊樓五宇之間이 可也어늘 或抅於顏私며 或緣於私▣야 或陰護而生色며 或藉托而買情야 旣不能對揚聖德고 又從而壞損▣軆야 自陷於方命之枓니 願諸公은 熟思소셔 夫國民之膏血온 豈非盡剝於貪饕之官吏也며 貪吏之所得은 豈非盡充於買官之資金也賣官之金貨 豈非輸於內藏乎內院之歲入이 浮於國庫而每患內用之不敷者豈非太半消融於▣輩之手歟아 然則國氏之於此輩에 其將視以同胞乎아 對以讎敵乎且諸公之於國勢▣情에 迨此岌嶪紛爭之▣▣야 亦豈無慼然改圖之念에리요마는 朝奏一▣暮輒失圖고 朝承一  勅에 暮乂轉環니 雖有伊博之謨와 管䈓之策이라도 莫之能矯於時局而徒被萬民之唾罵者ㅣ罘莫非此輩之舞弄以誤之也니 然則此非但人民之讐敵이라 抑亦諸公之讐敵也▣ 所以枚擧奸輩之名야 附錄▣別紙노니 此輩之前後奸狀은 諸公이 亦必有洞亮者存則可燭輿論之不誣也니 亟宜一一捉付司敗야 依法懲判야 以治君側之奸고 以除病民之蠧ㅣ豈非大臣事君之正道歟아 本會之必欲爲此者 非但爲民除害라 竊爲諸公逐羣奸야 以圖朝野之幸福也니 諸公이 若不俯納輿論야 一向因循則公憤所激으로 莫之能遏야 必自本會로 招奸問罪리니 窃恐▣衢之上의 濺了此輩之汚血也▣가노니 然▣國人之殺之也ㅣ豈不由於士司之失職歟아 諸公은 豈爲此哉시리오 願乞涵裁야 亟賜明敎焉別紙康洪大      成▣鎬      金大鎭張漢基      崔秉周      鄭▣悳張斗煥      曹世煥      姜會林李寅淳      李在寅      安永重李鼎薰      崔秉圭      韓鎭文李苾和      裴女桂香    壽  蓮

dcterms:title: 平壤倉庫狀况
dcterms:abstract: ●平壤倉庫狀况〔前号續〕何幸政府 此時平壤에 倉庫事業을 開始야 糓類를 擔保로고 低邊貸附야 十二月二十五日로 財政顧問支部內에 其事務所를 設고 小官監督의 下에 極히 簡易 方法으로 廣布貸出야 自來沈滯金融이 稍進活潑야 徒積糓類도 容易運轉야 化而爲資本야 地方購買漸生活氣고 又有資產信用者 採其根抵야 貿糓資金을 給與야 使買糓物而附之保管證야 換入擔保品며 或對邦人經營야 其作人與附近部落의 糓物買入의 資金을 供給며 特히 市塲을 催開야 使其細民을 浴於惠澤케며 普通商品을 擔保로거나 又 資金使用의 目的確實 者의 對야 不動產擔保로 貸附 同歲末의 金融을 緩和야 農產物의 價格暴落의 向야 銳意融通의 途를 開야 其結果 幸得達豫筭効果얏노라 初에 不動產中特히 店舖住家等을 擔保에 供을 彼等이 非常히 嫌忌나 漸次啓蒙야 貸與를 希望 者가 續出지라 元來事業의 開始가 日淺야 貸與金総計가 僅히 六萬餘元에 不過나 暫時沈淪 人心을 興發야 金融을 緩和야 地方貿糓에 從事 者가 續出에 至 則此 倉庫事業을 開始이 有力다야도 過이아닌쥴노 信고 每年結冰期間은 糓物價格이 低落 時期니 陰曆歲末前後가 最甚은 一般히 認知라 然而倉庫事業을 開始 後로 漸次價格이 騰貴야 歲未金融이 區迫 時期에 至야도 㪅히 低落지아니아니라 反히 騰貴야 今日에 及은 經濟上에 祝賀만 事實이니 金融機關이 具備은 農商民의 利益에 直接關係가 有을 覺悟케을 得야 地方開發上에 將來利益이 盖尠小지라 要컨 倉庫事業을 開始은 地方의 金融을 緩和야 糓物價格의 低落을 防止고 農業의 購買力을 增進야 直接間接으로 經濟上에 有助이 無疑지라 今에 其貸出金現在表를 添야 叅考의 資에 供랴노라貸與金現在表  今年二月十六日調查總貸與金六萬四百五十元內에 還收金八千四百元을 除면 現在貸與金實額이 五萬二千五十元이니 其中糓物擔保貸與金三萬百五十元內에 還收金六千四百元을 除면 現在貸與金實額이 二萬三千七百五十元이오 土地家屋擔保貸與金三萬三百元內에 還收金이 二萬元이라더라〔完〕

dcterms:title: 日法協約의 全文
dcterms:abstract: ●日法協約의 全文日法協約이 締結됨은 已揭얏거니와 其全文이 如左니 日法兩國政府 兩國에 存在 支那의 關係 鞏固케 고 且將來 誤散의 原因을 除去을 希望야 左의 協約을 締結기로 決니라日法兩國政府 淸國의 獨立及領土保全과 淸國에셔 各國의 商業臣民 又 人民에 對 均等待遇의 主義 尊重에 同意고 又兩締約國이 主權 保護權 又 占有權을 有 領域에 近邇 淸國의 各地方에셔 秩序及平和狀態가 確保됨을 特히 顧念으로 亞細亞大陸에셔 兩締約國의 地位及領土權을 保守기 爲야 右記各地方의 平和及安寧을 確保을 約니라 宣言書日本과 法領印度支那間의 通商에 關 宣言書가 如左니日法兩國政府 日本과 法領印度支那의 關係된 事 通商條約締結 商議 他日에 讓고 玆에 爲先協定이 如左니라日本國官吏及臣民은 法領印度支那에셔 身体와 財産保護에 關 一切 事項에 對야 最惠國待遇 享受지오 又法領印度支那의 臣民及保護民은 日本國에셔 同  待遇 亨受지로 但 本協定은 西曆一千八百九十六年八月四日에 日本國과 法國間에 協定된 通商稅海條約의 期限이 畢了을 因야 共히 効力을 失니라

dcterms:title: 畿察報吿
dcterms:abstract: ●畿察報告京畿觀察使 李根澔氏가 內部에 報告되 竹山郡 等地에 義兵이 侵索錢粮於村閭야 民不安業之由 昨有報明이온바 又此利川 安城 陰竹 陽智 四郡民訴를 鱗次接閱온 則 槪稱所謂 義兵이 成群作黨에 各持銃刀고 白晝橫行에 隨處突入야 錢糓 牛馬 等物을 恣意勒奪이 浮於綠林之類야 際玆農節에 貧富俱困야 萬無聊生之望이다 備盡情景이온바 痛彼頑類가 若是猖獗於畿甸之內이오니 此非但 目今 民情之騷擾라 實爲來後之慮이온 故로 玆又報告오니 亟行剿除야 以保民生케 라 얏고 又報되 管下各郡 賊警이 處處恣橫야 民不安堵의 報牒이 相續이기 另設方略야 期圖詗戢之意로 訓飭이 不啻申複이로 校賊之寡不敵衆과 椎銃之鈍不及利 論以形便에 勢所固然矣라 窃惟今日之計가 不戢其類면 民不聊生이올다 戢盜之方이 亶在於得人之如何이오니 依兩南例와 本道도 奏差戢捕官시되 以公正勇敢之人으로 選差 六七郡守시고 授以銃兵之權오며 使之董率各郡之別校고 廣設詗羅에 遠近巡哨則 庶可有効이올기 玆以報請오니 所謂 義兵段은 行飭鎭隊와 使之剿捕야 毋復滋蔓케 시고 賊警段은 奏差郡守에 兼任戢捕官오셔 另行巡捕케 라 얏더라

dcterms:title: 勅令
dcterms:abstract: ○勅令  朕이 資金會計法에 關 件을 裁可야 玆에 頒布케노라  隆熙元年十二月二十七日勅令第七十八號    資金會計法第一條  左開 事業을 爲야 起業資  金金融資金及工事資金을 寘고 各  特別會計 立케홈  一  道路水道其他起業上의 施設  二  金融機械의 設備其他金融上의      施設  三  開港의 維持設備及船路標職의      事業經營第二條  起業資金은 隆熙元年度末에  在 起業資金의 預定殘額으로 此  充홈  金融資金은 隆熙元年度末에 在 金  融資金의 預定殘額及將來의 回収額  으로 此에 充홈  工事資金은 隆熙元年度末에 在 海  關基金의 預定殘額으로 此에 充홈  各資金에셔 生 利子 各其資金에  編入이 可홈第三條  各資金의 保管方法은 主管大  臣이 度支部大臣과 協議야 此 定  이 可홈第四條  各資金은 必要 應야 此  一般會計에 推入使用이 可홈第五條  主管大臣은 每年度各資金會  計의 歲入歲出豫筭調書 調製야  前年度九月三十日內로 此 度支部  大臣에게 提出홈이 可홈第六條  主管大臣은 每年度各資金會  計의 歲入歲出决筭報告書 調製  야 翌年度六月三十日內로 此 度支  部大臣에게 提出이 可홈第七條  各資金會計의 每年度歲出豫  筭殘額은 遞次推移使用을 得홈      附  則第八條  本法은 隆熙二年붓터 施行홈第九條  隆熙元年度에 在 各資金의  豫筭殘額은 其資金과 共히 本會計에  推移使用을 得홈第十條  本法施行以前海關基金에셔  支辦 宮殿營造費의 殘額은 工事資  金에셔 此 支辦홈朕이 鹽業試驗塲官制에 關 件을 裁可야 玆에 頒布케노라  隆熙二年三月五日勅令第十一號    鹽業試驗塲官制第一條  鹽業試驗塲은 農商工部大臣  에 屬야 鹽業을 改良과 發達의 資를  調查及試驗에 關 事務를 掌홈第二條  鹽業試驗塲에 左關職員을 置  홈    場長    技師    專任三人    奏任    技手    專任十五人  判任    書記    專任十人    判任第三條  場長은 技師로 充야 農商工  部大臣의 指揮監督을 承야 一切場  務를 掌理홈第四條  技師 上官의 指揮를 承야  場務를 分掌홈第五條  技手 上官의 命을 承야 場  務에 從事홈第六條  書記 上官의 命을 承야 庶  務及會計에 從事홈第七條  農商工部大臣이 必要를 認  地에 鹽業試驗場出張所를 設야 本  場職員을 派送야 其事務를 分掌케  을 得홈第八條  鹽業試驗場規程及出張所位  置와 名穪은 農商工部大臣이 定홈      附  則本令은 頒布日로붓터 施行홈

dcterms:title: 地方消息
dcterms:abstract: ▲本月拾三日 京畿道九化場西北方約二拾里仙橋洞에셔 義兵十餘名이 場分遣所日憲兵三名及補助員五名과 交戰얏다 고▲本月十壹日 全南同福郡西北方約二十里되 馬山里에셔 義兵二十餘名이 該郡分遣所日憲兵及補助員四名과 交戰하얏다 고▲本月拾三日 全南南平郡西北方約십里地에셔 義兵六十餘名이 同郡分遣所日憲兵二名及補助員三名과 交戰얏다 고▲本月七日 全羅道筏橋南方約二十里되 山中에셔 義兵五十餘名이 同地分遣所日憲兵壹名及補助員三名과 交戰얏다 고▲本月八日 全羅南道靈光郡西南方約二拾里地三角山에셔 義兵五十餘名이 同郡分遣所日憲兵壹名及補助員六名과 交戰얏다 고▲本月拾壹日 全羅南道九幕院東北方約十里되 山中에셔 義兵拾二名이 院分遣所日憲兵二名及補助員壹名과 交戰얏다 고▲本月拾三日 陜川郡西南方約二拾五里地에셔 義兵五拾名이 該郡分遣所日憲兵壹名及補助員三名과 交戰얏다 고▲本月九日 淳昌郡西方約三十里地에셔 義兵十五名이 郡日守備隊上等兵以下四名과 交戰하얏다 고▲本月十九日 長城郡北方約三拾里地에셔 義兵七十名이 古阜郡日守備隊小尉以下十名과 交戰하얏다 고▲本月十四日 同福郡內에셔 義兵七拾五名이 玉果郡分遣所日憲兵幾名及補助員四名과 交戰얏다더라

dcterms:title: 勅令
dcterms:abstract: ○勅令  朕이 學部直轄學校職員定員改正에 關 件을 裁可야 玆에 頒布케노라  隆熙元年十二月十三日勅令第五十六號    學部直轄學校職員定員令第一條  成均館及普通學校를 除 外  에 學部直轄學校職員의 定員은 左와  如홈  官立漢城師範學校    學校長一人  學監一人    敎授及副敎授九人  學員監二人    訓導及副訓導六人  書記二人  官立漢城高等學校    學校長一人  學監一人    敎授及副敎授十人  學員監一人    書記一人  官立漢城外國語學校    學校長一人  學監一人    敎授及副敎授二十九人    學員監五人以內  書記五人以內  官立仁川日語學校    學校長一人  學監一人    敎授及副敎授五人  學員監一人    書記一人  官立平壤日語學校    學校長一人  學監一人    敎授及副敎授四人  學員監一人    書記一人第二條  學部大臣이 專任書記 置  必要가 無으로 認 時 當該學校  副敎授로 書記 兼任케      附  則第三條  本令은 隆熙二年一月一日로  붓터 施行홈第四條  光武十年 九月勅令第四十五  號 廢止홈朕이 農商工部官制改正에 關 件을 裁  可야 頒布케노라  隆熙元年十二月十三日勅令第五十七號    農商工部官制第一條  農商工部大臣은 農商工、水  產、林野、鑛山、地質、氣象及水上運  輸에 關 事務 管理홈第二條  大臣官房에셔 各部官制通  則에 揭 者外에 勸業上의 褒賞에 關   事務 掌홈第三條  農商工部에 左開五局을 置홈    農務局  商工局    山林局  鑛山局    水產局第四條  農務局에셔 左開事務 掌  홈  一  農業及蚕業에 關 事項  二  畜產及狩獵에 關 事項  三  國有未墾地에 關 事項  四  氣象에 關 事項第三條  商工局에셔 左開事務를 掌  홈  一  商業及商事會社에 關 事項  二  博覽會共進會及陳列館에 關      事項  三  工業及工塲에 關 事項  四  度量衡에 關 事項  五  商標及意匠에 關 事項  六  水上運輸에 關 事項第六條  山林局에셔 左開事務를 掌  홈  一  林業에 關 事項  二  國有林野에 關 事項第七條  鑛務局에셔 左開事務를 掌  홈  一  鑛業에 關 事項  二  地質及鑛床의 調査에 關 事項第八條  水產局에셔 左開事務를 掌  홈                  （未完）

dcterms:title: 叙任及辭令

dcterms:title: 法律第二拾九號
dcterms:abstract: ○法律第二拾九號  漁業法  （續）第十二條  漁業權을 不依고 第二條  第一項에 規定 漁業을거 又  第九條或은 第拾條의 規定에 違背  者 百圜以下의 罰金에 處고 採捕  物又 所有漁具를 何人의 所屬을 不  問고 此를 沒収 旣히 採捕物을 讓  渡거나 又 消費 時 其代價를  追徵홈  漁業權의 停止中又 免許或은 許可  의 條件에 違背야 漁業을 者 前  項과 同第十三條  使用人及漁夫其他從業者  의 所爲 漁業者의 所爲로 看做야  前條의 罰則은 此를 漁業者의게 適用  홈第十四條  本法施行에 必要 細則은  農商工部大臣이 此를 定홈      附  則第十五條  本法施行期日은 勅令으로  此를 定홈第十六條  如何 名義를 不問고 本  法施行前에 受 漁業의 免許又 從  來의 慣行을 因야 第二條第一項에  規定은 漁業을 者 本法施行日  노부터 一個年以內에 第二條의 規定  을 依야 免許를 請願이 可홈  本法施行前에 漁業鑑札의 下付 受   者 本法施行後라도 其鑑札의 有  効期間內 第九條又 第十條에 規  定 漁業을을 得홈  前項에 規定 者아니고 現에 第九條  又 第十條에 規定 漁業을 者   本法施行日노붓터 三個月以內에  第九條又 第十條의 規定을 依야  漁業의 許可 請願又 申告이 可  홈  第一項又 第三項의 漁業者 請願  의 許否處分을 受기지 又 申告   依야 漁業鑑札의 下付 受기  지 從前의 例 依야 漁業을  을 得홈

dcterms:title: 淸國朝野人物(前号續)
dcterms:abstract: 外  報  照  謄      淸國朝野人物    （前号續）    第八  各省人氣와 匪徒巢穴⊙玆에 一步를 更進야 各省人氣의 如何를 云건 湖南廣東은 効望이 確有 人種이오 湖南은 其民이 健康無虛飾야 軍事를 幹만고 廣東人은 輕捷利敏야 進取의 氣에 富니 外交局에 當만며 山東은 土地ㅣ瘦야 物產이 不擧 中其民은 終生不慈悲과 剛勁 其軆格이 十八省▣冠니 此ㅣ義和團大刀會小刀會白蓮敎의 匪徒蝟集 所以오 河南全省은 其民이 好義 福建도 稍佳고 廣西 廣東에 比면 人氣稍良며 其首府桂林은 明季永曆間皇帝南狩던 時에 行在所되얏고 且虞式耟의 徒ㅣ四方忠義의 士를 熾起야 割據의 計를 故로 其餘烈이 遺存야 淸朝를 反抗랴 者ㅣ恆常不絶거니의 湖北의 人民은 下品이라 與人爭論과 殺傷을 極히니 湖北의 一般人氣를 可히 察만고 安徽江西 人氣頗惡며 四川은 古蜀의 城府오 別乾坤  로 其民은 猜險고 江蘇浙江은 其民이 柔弱無大惡고 陜西甘肅은 邊境이오 回回敎徒의 根據地인 其民▣悍고 雲南貴州의 風氣 全不開進고 山西 商賈가 多出고 長江沿岸에셔 人氣最惡곳은 沙市蕪湖安慶等地니 恒常民變이 不絶더라                    （未完）

dcterms:title: 大韓自强會에셔 由來韓國의 惡慣悖習을
dcterms:abstract: 大韓自强會에셔 由來韓國의 惡慣悖習을 嚴行禁斷 事로 政府로 建議가 如左니 續痴亦甚矣오 四曰俚諺小說이니 其獘 淫鄙也라 雖云文明各國에도 尙有少說裨史之流行이나 取其情理切至면 善惡可鑑야 必經政府檢認而發行者 專爲感發其懲創之念故也어날 我國由來之所謂俚諺少說은 全以鄙俚乖육之事로 장撰挑淫飾詐之文야類多編入於大明成化年間고 其歸趣之所羡은 斷不過富貴雙全一生安樂而止고 如獨立國之偉大思想과 自由民之活動精神等少有補於國家進運之語則萬無其一而愚夫愚婦之燕安無事者ㅣ 飽 明窓에 朗讀玩昧야 消遣了千金一刻야 怠惰其志氣며 紊亂我風化니 其亦爲害於今日新敎育者ㅣ 不可數計而周知也라夫虛妄也와 奸僞也와 愚誕也와 淫鄙也 四者之中에 一或成俗於其國이라도 決難進於開明富强之或이온 況並此四者之痼瘼而仍成通俗者乎아 且現世列國之以文明稱者ㅣ 其或有此等汚俗者乎아 惟韓淸兩國之最以暗弱腐敗而名者ㅣ 並此四者之惡癖而惟恐或廢니 此豈非已現之確証者乎아 然則此四者之害 不惟馴致我今日之衰國이라 抑亦將來之回復國脈도 若不除此則無望이니苟有苦心於世道之汚下야 期圖保民族守疆土者ㅣ 曷不以此四者로 爲大讎大敵而卽欲焚其書滅其術哉아 惟我政府諸公閣下로 今日艱虞之際야 日夜之彈心竭力이 未嘗不在革舊維新而舊染이 未除며 新智ㅣ 未開고 敎育이 不進며 四業이 不興은단단 是四者之害가 煽虛吹妄而民無定志며國無善俗故也라 如巫覡사妄之嚴禁은 已有刑法定條니 只可依律禁단而足矣오 如相地筭命相人等雜術書類 另定法律야 一切搜索야 嚴行禁廢고 如現行小說紊亂風俗者를 亦爲禁除而依文明國例야 立規刊布야 以定民志며 以正國俗케심이 爲今日莫大之救獘이읍기 玆以建議오니 査照랍심을 伏望 完

dcterms:title: The following appropriation bills have passed the Council of State and received
dcterms:abstract: DEPARTMENTAL NEWS.The following appropriation bills have passed the Council of State and received the approval of His Majesty : $612 for repairs of the road to the Imperial Mausoleum; $10,000 for the food for the coolies during the Imperial funeral ; $19,680 for additional cost making Imperial seals; $8,000 for construction of temporary shelter at the Imperial mausoleum ; $56,786 for purchasing the ground for the Seoul-Chemulpo railway from the city to the river; $2,26114 for establishment of the Appellate Court; $8,969,623 for establishment of Police Offices in Chinnampo, Mokpo, Cheiju districts ; $200,000 for additional reserve fund of the Treasury

dcterms:title: MR. R WILLIS REPORT ON HIS JOURNEY TO PEYNGYANG AND CHINNAMPO
dcterms:abstract: MR. R WILLIS REPORT ON HIS JOURNEY TO PEYNGYANG AND CHINNAMPO.(Continued from the last issue).In addition to the rich agricultural resources of the Tatong Valley there is also a large supply of mineral wealth especially in the Pyengyang provinceㅡthere are also reported to be rich gold mines in the southern part of Hoanghaiㅡwhich may play an important part in the future development of the new port.\"Place\" gold mining is candid on very largely in the no◈◈◈rr portion of pyengyang province in the tributary s◈ca◈rs of the Tatong and Yalu Rivers, and in 1897 the Korean Government granted a concession to work gold in the district of Wonsanㅡnot to be confounded with the treaty portㅡa tract of about 25 square miles, situated about 1◈0miles north of Pyengyang city, to an American syndicate. There are about a dozen foreign engineers resident at present; a mill has been set up and at the time of my visit to Pyengyang the manager was awaiting with some anxiety the result of the first crushings.When the Americans fist took possession of their concession they encountered considerable opposition from the local \"placer\" miners, who naturally objected to what they considered a violation of their natural rights. The syndicate was practically boycotted, no workmen could be obtained, supplies were refused, and at one time a serious outbreak was expected. However, permission to the miners to continue their \"placer\" mining in some parts of the concession, and the offer of good wages, in the end gained for the concessionaires the privilege of a peaceful enjoyment of their rights. The wages paid to the Korean miners are ◈◈c a day (10d.), and the manager of the mine professes himself perfectly satisfied with the quantity and quality of their work; thouth a man of considerable experience in mining, he informed me that Koreans compared favorably with any other miners he had had dealings with; if properly supervised they did good and intelligent work, cost little, and were easily managed.Within a radius of 10 miles from Pyengyang no less than nine coal mines have been worked of recent years. The enterprise was started by the governor of the province in 1885 as a Government speculation, but this method not proving remunerative the concession, to work the mines was granted to private persons on payment of a fixed royalty. We visited one mine about suites north-east of Pyengyang on the ◈◈◈th bank of the river, distant half a mile from the share. The mining consisted of mere surface scratching, the cuttings being not more than from 10 to 15 feet. About 200 tons were lying baggedㅡvery badlyㅡand ready for shipment by the riverside. The soul is a soft anthracite, burns with a great deal of dust and gives little heat; it has been tried and found useless for steamer purposes, but has largely been employed in Koreaㅡin the form of coal ballsㅡfor use in coal ballsㅡfor use in foreign stoves, which it seems to suit better than the Japanese bituminous coal. Whether coal of a better quality could be found at a deeper level is, of course, a question for an expert; at any ◈◈◈ the mining so far has been confined to the enrface scratching I gave described. The cost of this coal is 2 dol. 5 c. a ton at the pits month, and 5 dol. when laid down properly bagged and ready for shipment at Posan.In ◈◈◈◈◈◈on to Chinese and Japanese I have mentional ◈◈◈◈◈aling at Pyengyang the foreign population cons◈◈◈◈ seven or eight American citizens, representing two missionary societies, one Presbyterian and one Methodist, who have both flourishing stations here. The former mission have purchased, in Korean names, some 5 or 6 acres of land outside the west gate, where, amongst other building, they have erected a hospital, at which no less than 11,000 patients were treated during 1896. They report that Pyengyang is an excellent centre for evangelistic work, then converts numbering at least 1,000 after two and a half years´ residence there. The Koreans of these northern provinces are, in the opinion of these missionaries who have lived amongst them, far more satisfactory than their southern compatriots. They are more honest and reliable, as well as more enterprising, diligent, and industrious, a view that is borne out by the foreign merchants who have had dealings with them.In view of the number of foreigners at present settled in the city, in appears to me greatly to be regretted that the Korean Government have decided not to open the place to foreign residence. Pyengyang is the commercial centre of the country, and it is portable that at any rule for years Chinnampo will be little more than a depot. Meantime, the business operations of the foreign merchants cannot fail to be badly hampered if they are compelled to rely on native agents at the central market.During our four days´ stay at Pyengyang we found excellent quarters in a telegraph office, the official in charge, who was a friend of our interpreter, placing three rooms at our disposal, and treating us with the greatest kindness and consideration. The telegraph office at Pyengyang is a comparatively busy one, the gross receipts, I was informed by the manager, being in excess of any other office in Korea. It is largely patronized by Koreans, and in one day during my visit no less than 70 native messages were de-patched from the office. The cost is 1 e. per word in the native character, and 10 e per w◈◈d in far◈p◈◈m languages to any ◈◈◈◈ of Korea. A post office, w◈◈◈◈ has recently been established, has not yet met with a proportionate success. A courier leaves daily for Seoul, but the average bag at present is not more than 80 letters a day, whilst 18 couriers have to be maintained to keep up the service

dcterms:title: 西邊界副約長李完求의 積功 속
dcterms:abstract: 五 徃在乙巳年分一進會事務所를 處處設立이오되 各郡會員이 或云調査委員或云摠代或云視察或云監督或云代辦專權或云代辦監督或云都評議라며 首尾相接越來야 鄕約所 都是紛競이라며 撤罷揭榜오니 愚蠢殘氓이 何知其理由리오 革罷鄕所日에 會平間或有拘拒之事면 定司察捉來平民야 不辨是非고嚴杖牢囚或至徵贖오니 民難支保야 擧皆流散이온則其是一進會監督으로 下來얏던 金麟奎가 從其民情야 更設行政所며 以李完求로 邊界官長來莅前視務케이온데 無偏無碍에 事事歸一케오며 交際於外國人야使民安堵케옵고 日露開戰時에 李完求가 緣於事故야 上京之時에 楚山郡鄕吏輩와 酬應監等이 符同日通辯야 卜定人負와 各樣討索에 所害錢이 乃爲七八萬兩이라 一界之民이 皆爲流離이홉더니 李完求還家以後에 交際日憲兵所야 捉囚通변옵고 更無雜役케야 一界安堵오니 其功이 五也六 今丙午年分에 通化縣境內居留民이 綠於會員之壓制야 付之청國이온바 百般歸化中魁首金時禎이가 爲日通辯金泰根와 所謂本礦公局이 在於通化縣城中이거날 以無根之說로 百般搆誣야 反對 大韓이온거슬 公函于楚山郡憲兵隊야 現今金時禎을 捉囚楚山郡이온則其功이 六也李完求之前後積功이 如此오니 依邊民請願시와 使李完求로 特差管理專務옵셔 勿失邊民之所望伏祝이오며 若有不然이오면 奏稟于 天陛시와 褒賞李完求之功績심물 伏望홈 完

dcterms:title: 兩會修函
dcterms:abstract: ⊙(兩會修函)昨日下午一時에 獨立協會와 總商會에셔 事務所로 開會고 外部大臣朴齊純氏에게 修函엿기로 左에 記載노라敬啓者東西諸國에 開眀 人民은 通商交涉에 彼此拘碍이 無오나 萬一未開 人民으로 防限을 不立오면 茂林中의 細草不長과 如야 土種이 消殘지니 此 世界上의 自然 理勢라 故로 我國에셔 當初與外人으로 通商條約을 定 時에 各港口岸租界를 畫야 某國商民이던지 租界十里外에 不得踰越케얏오니 此條項이엇지 四海同胞의 彼此를 分이리오 實노 未開 人民을 保護야 茂林細草의 患이 無고져이라 近年以來로 所定 約章을 等諸束閣야 府郡各地方定界以外에 外人이 土地를 買占며 房屋을 賃造야 商民의 權利와 農戶의 產業이 日耗月損오니 土爲外人所有고 戶爲外人所占면 國名이 雖存이나 國計 實空이라 言念    國事에 寧不寒心乎잇가 本會에셔 漆室의 憂로 不忍坐視焚溺이기 玆에 仰佈오니  貴大臣게오셔 條約을 按야 各府郡租界外의 居留 外國商民를 一一히 通商口岸으로 移送고 外人이 土地買占 獘를 截禁오셔 木土人種으로 農商에 業을 保存케시오며 且以漢城言之라도 京城及楊花津이 雖在約章第四欵通商處所之中이오나 外國人의 買地購屋坐市開棧이 日益滋蔓오니 若此不已오면  輦轂下若千地段의 我民所居가 無幾지라 約章苐十一欵中에 應行更改之處 酌量增删이란 句語가 有오니 然즉 當改處 改홈도 亦是條約이라 一年之先에 預爲聲明와  都下人民汲汲 情形을 別般矯救심을 伏望홈光武二年十月十八日議政府贊政外部大臣朴齊純  閣下

dcterms:title: THE PARIS CONFENCE
dcterms:abstract: THE PARIS CONFENCE.A Paris telegram under date of the 2nd inst., received in tokyo(presmably by the Government), was in the following sense:-All the terms of peace except those relating to the Philippines appear to have been settled without difficulty. The American members of the Conference are now waiting for the arrival of General Merritt before acutally deciding the terms as regards the Philippines to be placed before Conference. The opinion of the American members is divided, nsome holding that the retention of the whole of The Philippine group by the United States will be prejudicial to American principles and others that should the Philippines be returned to Spain, the result will be continual trouble in the Far East.The French press opposes the retention of the Philippines by America.-Kobe Chronicle

dcterms:title: 贊議議業
dcterms:abstract: ●贊議議業中樞院副贊議 沈宜性氏가 政府에 建議 案件이 如左니 夫樞院之官을 名之以贊議 副贊議니 顧名思意컨 爲其議事而議人也則 所謂 言官也라 經에 曰 無諸己以後에 非諸人이라 니 欲其議謬事而正之며 議非人而退之면 若不先擇其議之者之人格則 必不可也어날 近見副贊議之新任者ㅣ 類多出於作宰而居下者니 抑或 其才가 不能於牧民이 能於議事歟아 若或 居下於郡守者도 優可居副於贊議則 顧此樞院이 何能議事之謬而議人之非也며 若以樞院으로 爲下等郡守左遷之藪而不行其職務也則 顧此善良 機關으로 委之以陷落於傭人之手야 使至腐敗니 是 國家軆裁에 汚損을 難免이오 若使諸僚로 與下等人爲伍則 是 爲人身分에 耻辱이 莫甚이라 玆將官制改定案야 附錄如左니 一次建議政府야 若不實行則 請一軆辭職야 以完公器 事左開 官制改正案本院官制中第二條下에 副贊議라 副字 刪去고 第三條 議長 副議長과 贊議 勅敍라 贊議下에 八人二字를 添入고 副贊議 參書官은 議政大臣이 奏敍라 副贊議의 副字 刪去고 贊議下에 十五人三字를 添入고 本條下에 但 字項을 添入되 勅奏任贊議를 改選 境遇에 議政府로셔 中樞院에 諮詢야 該院公薦을 待야 敍任되 其公薦方法은 該院議事規則에 添入고 第五條 全軆刪去

dcterms:title: The Chief Constable of the Western Station made the following report to the Central
dcterms:abstract: The Chief Constable of the Western Station made the following report to the Central Police Department:\"On the 12th may, Ye Kyengsi filed a complaint to the station saying that on the 2nd May his brother, Ye Kyengpil, entered the English legation as a coolie; that on the morning of the 15th, while he was sweeping the ground , the constable of the said Legation kicked him, inflicting on him severe injuries, for not sweeping properly. The young man was carried home but his condition was so critical that he was taken on the 10th to the English Legation. The British Minister ordered to have him sent to the Nakdong hospital where he died immediately on arrival.\"\"Herewith I send you the detailed statement of the case; but I am unable to accompany it with the accused, he being an English constable, nor the witnesses as they are all employees in a foreign legation.(We regret very much to have to record such an instance of violence on the part of the English constable. We suspend our judgement until we shall possess all the details on both sides of the case, feeling assured that the English authorities here will give the matter that attention which the gravity of the case deserves.―T. H. Y.)

dcterms:title: 宮廷錄事
dcterms:abstract: 官報●宮廷錄事秘書院郞安弼鎬書奏臣於陰曆五月初一日丑時量敬奉聖諭馳往傳諭于南署明禮坊明洞契議政府議政尹容善所住處則以爲臣蒙恩家食者纔三朔耳忽伏奉議政復授之命此誠意慮夢想之所不到也震越罔措卽欲鑽地而不可得也臣之當初辭免非規避也卽由於衷情之畢陳也陛下之卽賜矜許亦由於實狀之洞察也君臣上下之間恩義兩全臣方仰戴洪恩晝宵感祝曾未幾月又有是命臣實訝惑不已繼之以悸雙皇恧也今又簪筆之臣來宣聖諭諄複懇摯有非無狀如臣所敢承當苟如是也其始也臣何必苦辭陛下何必矜許之乎苟艱顚倒寔骸具瞻文字控陳殆涉備例疾病爲辭有嫌占便謹當冒登文陛面達衷曲仰冀反汗之恩而偕來有命史官之陋地相守尤增皇隘伏願先賜召還焉云矣臣旣承仍與偕來之命故姑爲仍留之意敢奏答曰知道 ○詔曰聞議政方造朝云爲國事萬幸偕來史官還人以安大臣之心 ○詔曰皇太子疏批秘書卿持傳 ○詔曰皇太子疏批秘書卿持傳 ○令曰當率百官庭請矣 ○令曰日已向晩明日當更爲庭籲矣 ○皇太子上疏曰伏以昨年惟我父皇陛下聖壽將躋五旬之慶年也今年惟我父皇陛下聖壽恰滿五旬之慶年也連年之慶會洊臻每歲之應行典禮爰有祖宗朝金石不易之規小子之苦懇積以歲月累牘聯章殆至屢數千言此非小子一人之言也乃匝域臣民大同之言而聖批靳兪只令今年月正元日進致詞擧賀儀是豈足以賁飾大慶少伸小子之情禮哉夫上天之篤棐而眷佑綏之以多福申之以永命以啓萬億無彊之休者必待乎聖人作而樹立宏大有功德於天下國家而後有焉稽之逞牃盖不世而遭逢惟我父皇陛下運撫中恢肇建大業巍蕩盛烈光前裕後實有邁於創垂溯考三代以降未或有媲隆焉天之所報者宜其如此而如日之升月恒如川之方至奇祥異瑞諸福之應湊集而騈臻凡爲臣子歡祝之忱夫豈有其極而苟非有寓之於物而著之於形聲焉則亦無以輸寫其歡祝之忱矣是以豐豫而陳之歌詠而道之萬舞而暢之小大臣鄰飽之以大饌醉之以大酒使之欣欣抃蹈於鐘鼓管絃之音協氣懽聲洋溢區宇達于上下仰以悅豫祖宗在天之靈俯以和樂黎庶環海之濱又有以導迎而召致之此讌饗之禮所由始而有國之所重也自古在昔未嘗有遇有慶而廢其禮近而我家禮又班班可攷矣父皇陛下雖欲固讓彜典不可越也天心不可違也臣民之願不可遏也且連年之慶迄有未稱焉者而今年聖節又慶年之慶節也慶會之萃集未有如今年者則其在小子知年愛日之誠其欲圖效於萬一者其果何如哉惟我父皇陛下孝理之政大而無外品物之衆無不各遂其性者小子今日之至願宜有以軆察之矣玆敢復申前請於閱歲屢懇之餘伏願父皇陛下淵然三思勉回謙衷流虹之月內外進宴之儀亟下成命俾典憲罔缺輿情獲伸焉無任攢手祈祝之至謹拜疏以聞答曰省疏具悉爾懇爾之連年爲懇者旣屢矣而朕之爲諭者亦屢矣意其將順朕志遂姑已之何爲而又有此申提也非爾之所宜如此非朕之所圖者也飾慶之擧其在乂安閒暇之日亦爲張大矧於此時而遑可擬議乎無待多誥其庶諒會勿復以是爲煩皇太子再次上疏曰伏以小子無似忱誠淺薄不能仰格崇高文字短拙未得導達志意連年屢懇之餘又復冒徹而聖批一向靳許豈徒小子抑塞徊徨靡所容措已也大小臣民之倀倀失望齎鬱而莫之因極者大可見矣有國之爲慶而可以稱述焉者功德瑞應吉祥之事名號不一而慶莫大於慶聖人之壽惟天惟祖宗所以眷顧騭佑於聖君列辟之有大勳於國家子孫萬世之業者必降以永年福祿壽考臣子之所願于上者亦惟是而已是以我列聖朝慶聖壽之典禮尤重未或有遇是而無有稱焉惟我父皇陛下今年聖壽適符於羲易大衍之數萬有千歲無彊之寶筭實兆於今年伊始今年之慶最莫大焉遇玆千載罕有萬歲將進之慶年列聖朝相承已行之彝典未必有行焉則其在我父皇陛下克儉克讓之聖德固爲欽頌讚嘆而洪範曰龜從筮從卿士從庶民從是之謂大同是可以見人主亦有所不得獨行其志者矣今小子之請乃大同之願也父皇陛下其亦宜有以不得不從者矣小子亦不敢以將順爲事憚於瀆屑而遂止不言矣環東土芸芸蒼生其將胥謂小子盍亟請而格回聖衷焉則小子無所逃其責矣小子悶迫之私又有未可以文字言語形容者矣玆敢冒陳切迫之懇伏願父皇陛下劃准小子之請亟降兪音上答天慶下從人心焉無任懇迫祈祝之至謹拜疏以聞答曰省疏具悉爾懇前後之批夫豈出於修飾揖遜而乃此頻復張皇有若固請而不止者然甚未可知也祖宗之禮卽三代之禮也有時而行有時而未必行亦所以損益之義也朕非不嘉乃忱誠所言者亦或其然而其時則不可矣一直苦懇致煩醻應其於養志之道果何如也爾其諒之勿爲更提 以上六月十六日

dcterms:title: 隆煕貳年拾月拾日 官報
dcterms:abstract: ○産業 (續)○東洋척殖株式會社定欵第十條 本會社 韓國政府가 左開財産을 出資을 承認고 其財産價格金三百萬圜에 對하야 六萬株 出給壹 畓 五千七百町步壹 田 五千七百町步第拾壹條 本會社의 株式數爻 二十萬株로 고 壹株의 金額을 金五十圓으로 第十二條 本會社株主의 責任은 其株式의 金額으로쎠 限度로 第拾三條 本會社의 株券은 壹株券. 五株券. 拾株券. 五拾株券. 百株券. 及千株券의 六種으로 第拾四條 本會社의 株券에 社名. 登記年月日. 資本의 總額. 壹株의 金額. 辦納의 金額及番號等을 記載고 総裁가 此에 記名押印第拾五條 株金辦納은 每壹株에 第壹回條를 金십二圜五십錢으로 고 第二回以後 事業의 必要 應야 総裁가 其辦納金額及期限을 定고 先期三십日前야 各株主에게 其通知를 發되 壹株의 辦納金額은 每回金二十圜五拾錢을 超過치 아니第拾六條 株主가 辦納期日에 株金을 辦納치 아니 時 其辦納金額에 對야 每百圜에 壹日金五錢의 比例로 滯納利息을 徵收第十七條 第壹回株金辦納期日後 十五日을 經過야 其辦納을 아니 時 拾五日以內에 辦納라 意로 催告되 期限에 至야 仍不辦納 時 本會社의 株主된 權利를 失다 旨 通知을 得前項의 境遇를 當야 其權利 失 時 已爲辦納바 証據金은 還付치 아니[未完]

dcterms:title: 平北馳報
dcterms:abstract: 雜報●平北馳報平北▣察使李容觀氏가 管下各▣報를 內部▣報告하되 宣川郡에난 十月八日에 所謂進步會數百名이 突入邑中하야 自手削髮하고 一向屯聚而其中金彩鳳等三名을 捉囚하얏고  定州郡에난 十月七日에 姜變虎金昌河等이 領率衆民四百名▣고 稱以進步會하고 來留城底하야 一齊斷髮하고 曉諭不散故로 姜▣兩人을 保囚하▣고  龜城郡에난 十月八日에 東匪千餘名이 攔入城底하야 同九日에 移會南門外하고 一時斷髮에 尙不解散▣라하얏고  郭山郡에난 十月八日에 進步會三百餘名이 來▣邑底而定州駐箚日本司令部憲兵이 該會中數三人을 査問次執留하얏고  博川郡에난 十月八日에 朴基根杆琮根이 來入官廳하야 進步會通文을 出示郡守而辭意則以輔國安民斷髮齊心으로 措辭하얏고  嘉山郡에난 十月八日에 亂民幾百名이 稱進步會하고 屯聚邑底而日陣所로셔 金洪敏等四人을 捉去하얏고  泰川郡에난 十月八日에 進步會六百名이 來會于舘宇門樓라하고 又十月十五日午前에 會長與會黨六七百名이 來會鄕廳하야 與日憲兵으로 移時筆談하고 曉論安業하되 終不解歸故로 捉囚魁首三名하고 亦以萬端開諭로 一不退去하고 忽然瓦石이 投入廳舍하기로 憲兵與監理署巡檢兵丁이 齊力示威하야 始乃解送하고 其中抗拒者數十名을 一軆捉囚이더니 會黨幾千이 乘暮入境하야 聲言曰遺人放火하고 巡檢兵丁을 殺害云故로 日憲兵이 一邊邇奇於兵站部하고 一邊帶率監理署巡檢及兵丁九名하고 防守矣러니 會黨이 或騎或步하야 高掛紅繕白旗하고 數千名이 果爲來到하야 喊聲相迫에 景色危急하야 對敵砲殺者ㅣ四名이오 溺水死者六名이오 負傷者一名이라 若非日憲兵來救면 峽中殘邑이 未知至於何境더라하니 愚蠢之類가 胥動惑象에 悶不畏法故로 施威彈壓次訓飭安州三十隊하야 一小隊兵丁을 叧派來府케하얏다더라

dcterms:title: THE FUNERAL PROCESSION OF PRINCE AND PRINCESS TAI WON
dcterms:abstract: LOCAL ITEMS. THE FUNERAL PROCESSION OF PRINCE AND PRINCESS TAI WON. From early hours, on the 15th inst., main streets of Seoul were crowded with people. Among them was noticed a large number of country dames going about in groups, with their veils folded and tied on the heads. It appears they realized that their advanced age made it quite unnecssary to \"blush unseen,\" (if they ever blush) under a piece of green silk. At any rate, we were glad to see these folks enjoy themselves \"doing up\" Seoul with its wonders they never say before among which we may suggest the tall legation buildings, Japanese monkey shows, Chinese jugglers and Koreans on bicycles. But primarily it was none of these novel sights that people came to see from the surrounding villages. It was the funeral procession of T. R. H. the Prince Tai Won and the Princess Yeu Hung, that attracted so large a crowd of spectators. Starting from the Oon-Hyen Palace, the old residence of the Prince and Princess, the procession began to move at 6 p.m. It was preceded by three pairs of maskers on ponies to scare away evil spirits. This was followed by sacrificial furniture and utensils. Two chairs supposed to contain the spirits of the departed came next, borne by ten men each, escorted by a large number of palace guards and of policemen. Two more chairs carrying the personal belongings of the dead followed. A small portable shrine painted black, and richly carved was the next in program, carrying the wooden tablets for the Prince and Princess to be hereafter worshipped as the representatives of the departed souls. this was followed by the officers of Bureau of Funeral Rites and the personal attendants etc, of the Prince. About sixty maids of honor came next closely vailed and mounted on horses, surrounded by a sort of moving tent to keep the fair cavalcade from the gaze of the multitude. Four hundred or more streamers on which were written the eulogies composed for the occasion was a sight in itself. Two empty catafalques, borne by thirty men each, was followed by two pairs of \"Cloud fans\" so called a pairof long banners of crimson silk blazing forth in letters of gold the high sounding titles of the Prince and of the Princess. A big umbrella of green silk preceded the most important item of the program, viz., the two real cadafalques containing the remains of the August dead escorted by mourners, officials of government and et cetra. All the wards and trade guilds in the city and its suburbs, as well as the monks from different temples, sent delegations to attend the procession. They all carried lanterns, red or white, and when lit, the illumination added brilliancy and gayness to the otherwise solemn scene. The interment took place at 2 p.m. on the 16th inst. with elaborate ceremonies. All the expenses counccted with the funeral. obsequies were borne by His Majesty

dcterms:title: 盛况格談
dcterms:abstract: ●盛况格談  恩津江鏡浦普明學校에셔 春季運動을 灌燭寺山下平地에 開行하얏 飛跳引繩競走와 筭術競走提燈競走兩人三脚各樣運動에 優等廿人을 一一施賞畢에 談話會를 開하야 校長代辦方圭錫氏가 新舊學問과 忠君愛國的血誠으로 尾尾勸勉하고 日語敎師李承春氏 文明國法律政治로 盛說하고 法語敎師朴祥煥氏 民智發達國權維持가 亶在學問으로 歷述하고 漢文敎師柳興國氏는 課工進就와 實業踐履를 盡誠討論後에 一齊히 萬歲를 三唱하고 千歲를 三呼졔 迫曛歸路에 每員이 各提一燈하니 箇箇列星에 煌煌着普明校號라 踏歩口令으로 還到江鏡하니 是日은 陰曆燈夕이라 畵棚紈燈이 連屋繞樹 學員의 愛國歌가 一隊淸新하야 亘聯長街에 歩武齊響하니 父老男女擁路譖賞者人山人海오 外國人도 爭相玩聽하 中有一老叟가 奮臂大讚曰吾生長於斯老於斯에 年今七十이라 慣看燈夕호 郡守官人船游졔 延奉船方席火에 浦民困難是何科程。隊隊年少逐逐歌舞淫樂佚宕達夜졔 蕩敗家產卒業이지。作頭札翰風月句。豪華兩班文章인체 存問請挾雜訟軸京鄕出入好行世軍。쓸업지 舊習다바리고 今日이라도 自驕自矜그만두고 學校에 入學하야 幼少科工夫하오 勵聲大談하니 老少觀者가 拍手甘聽하고 皆稱格談하는 其人은 原來土夫後裔로 無意仕路하고 內開明修存 人이라더라

dcterms:title: 淒風苦雨
dcterms:abstract: 寒盡而陽生며 哀極而樂至 人事之常也어날 奈何韓之現狀은 去去山高水深야 和氣日索고 愁歎之聲이 不絶니 苟究厥由면 誰執其咎일지頃自日俄開戰以來로 一帶西北地方이 橫被兵燹하야 公私蕩然이고 軍需之供給과 銕道之赴役에 農者罷耕며 商者失業야 千般苦楚 前後備受이다가 猶其喘息이 未定야셔軍用地事件이 接踵而起야 掘盡百餘萬塚에 白骨이 如山야 啾啾寃魂이 慘於戰場이며 幾千萬家屋과 幾千萬田土가 盡八毀撤之中이라失棲瑣尾之子들이 扶◈絜幼에 千里相續하야 凍餒死亡에 淚盡血繼하니 上天이 矜憐하사 庶幾悔禍이거날一夜狂風에 所謂新條約이 又出하야 中外官民이 奔走激昻하며 許多忠臣義士之捐生者有之하고 被執者有之하야 萇弘之血이 已碧하며 鍾儀之冠을 空戴하야 全國이 洶洶에 至于今餘波未靜이더니復何비 首客이 空中閃出하야 一場 疑獄을 無端打起하야 轉相株連에 獄戶充滿하니 未知此案이 何時可了일지 衆情이 惴惴에 騷訛日甚이고各該敎徒會員이 紛紛然四面蜂起야 威福을 擅作며 百弊를 釀成키로 民不聊生야 怨방이 如沸니 凡此제般悲境을 驚心慘目에 有不可枚論지라俄日開戰之前에 韓之危亂이 未必至於此甚인즉 以此論之컨 偏被其戰禍者ㅣ 莫如韓國이며 因此而垂亡者ㅣ 亦莫如韓國이거날乃以保全維持等說로 簸弄股掌을 如戱小兒니 萬目之所睹와 萬口之所傅에 爲此說者ㅣ 能不自愧乎아大抵事到極頂면 其變이 必速나니 韓之禍亂이 可謂已極矣라 寒盡陽生이 厥理不爽야 海外風雲이 其將一變지니惟願韓之同胞 硬着脊梁며 動心忍性야 敎育을 是務며 團體를 完結야 靜而待之가 其可乎哉인져

dcterms:title: 敍任及辭令

dcterms:title: 蔘圃大賊
dcterms:abstract: ●蔘圃大賊 經理院에셔 漢城裁判所에 照會하되 現接獘院所管開城蔘政課長李健爀의 所報則內開에 府居韓志洙가 瑞興郡所在 李祖膺의 蔘圃를 僞造憑票하야 將欲典當이다가 現發於本主하야 仍爲捉致查覈하온즉 其父韓致安이가 僞造憑票하야 藏于手帒中故로 渠亦窃取하야 欲爲典用이다가 被捉云이기 韓致安을 幷即捉來하야 取招 則所供內에 矣身이 昨年五月分에 潛往日本大坂야 蔘圃憑票를 以鐵板으로 摹本印出하고 圖章四個를 幷爲摹刻하야 二十張僞券을 藏置이다가 八月分에 金川味山所在秦在奎의 圃名七根蔘二千間을 其年根及間數와 圃在地名과 圃主姓名을 暗書하야 假稱原憑票하야 日人駕谷處에 典當고 得債九萬兩하옵고 十一月分에 又以秦在奎의 圃名憑票一張과 金川月屯里所在許日瑞의 圃名七根一千五百間憑票二張을 僞造하야 日人月山處에 典用十五萬兩하고 又於十二月分에 同圃名二處憑票를 疊造하와 日人丸山處에 典用十七萬五千兩云이온바 公用券及印章을 詐造하야 他人의 物을 盜典하거시 俱係罔赦之罪이온 則此人罪犯은 自有當律이고 且事係外國人하야 必不無交涉之舉이온 現方日本理事府에셔 泒送 巡查로 先爲談判이오니 今此獘端이 蔘圃憑票를 喑典喑執 所以로 致此欺詐이온 則自本院으로 日本理事府에 轉照하시와 凡蔘圃憑票與典當을 無論內外國人하고 必先本課에 經由하야 認其許可後에 施行케하시와 嚴防後獘케하시면 可無見欺僞造之端이고 韓致安供招記를 玆에 粘上報告라바 該韓致安을 押上事로 業經指飭이더니 繼接該課長의 所報則內開에 指令을 承와 右囚韓致安을 押上하오며 該事件을 㪅加嚴覈하온 則與初供으로 互有異同더러 同謀者가 又有李金兩人이기 即爲跟探하온 則業已逃躱와 莫知影響이고 該供招記를 玆又粘上이오며 現捉僞券五張과 僞造圖章四個를 一體交付하오니 依法懲辦하심을 爲要라하얏더라

dcterms:title: 宮廷錄事
dcterms:abstract: 官報●宮廷錄事詔曰邇來民生之困瘁而不自按堵者不一其端爲吏者貪汚成習割剝殘虐無所不到雜稅之痛革而奸猾之牟利未盡袪矣諸般派遣之專事蟊賊者一幷罷還而列郡之已作痼瘼猝難蘇息又比歲歉荒艱食顚連玆盖由朕否德不明于爲理使我赤子不得樂其生而安其居興念及此一榻耿耿近日關西一路尤爲可憫隣邦戎爲纒屬于途藉曰紀律整齊所過與所駐無所侵害於我民而自致驚騷扶携▣離里邑胥隷因緣討索而居者亦無以枝梧當此春務方殷之時隴畝無人哀我黎庶其將何以全其軀而保其妻孥乎星夜馳往周行列郡窮峽荒筮靡不遍至懷綏而安集之凡所以爲弊者到底廉蔡便宜措處其或郡守之不能守其職而失次者又其饕䬸而尤無良者隨卽登聞論罪沿路附近農耕不及時處躬檢其形止今年春等戶布特爲蠲除一切有關於民事者其克悉心對揚毋或紕漏以紓朕西顧之憂學分付平安南北道按撫使光武八年四月四日元帥府軍務局摠長臨時署理議政府賛政軍部大臣陸軍副將臣尹雄烈謹  奏義州郡守具完喜現帶日本國進北軍隊接應官行將前往而戰陣間往來軍事上酬應其必以武裝從戎似合便宜且有義用郡守兼帶該隊叅領之例今亦以接應官具完喜附授叅領使之便利從事恐未知何如謹  奏光武八年四月三日奉  旨依奏議政府叅政趙秉式謹  奏平安南北道按撫使旣已差下矣不可無屬員從事官一員差下使之帶同前往何如謹上  奏光武八年四月六日奉  旨依奏漢城裁判所首班判事金錫圭辭職疏  批旨省疏具悉卿其勿辭行公四月六日

dcterms:title: 法律
dcterms:abstract: ○法律  朕이 森林法에 關 件을 裁可야 玆에 頒布케노라  隆熙二年一月二十一日法律第一號    森林法第一條  森林은 其所有者에 依야 此  를 分되  帝室林、國有林、公有林  及私有林으로홈  山野는 森林에 凖야 本法을 適用第二條  國有森林山野의 賣却、讓與、  交換又 貸付及國有森林產物의 賣  却의 關 規定은 勅令으로 定홈  國土保安又 國有林野의 經營上國  有保存의 必要되 森林山野 此를  賣却、讓與、交換又 貸付 事 得  치못홈第三條  農商工部大臣은 造林者와 其  収益을 分収 條件으로 國有森  林山野에 部分林을 設定을 得홈第四條  部分林의 樹木은 國과 造林者  의 共有로고 其持分은 収益分収部  分에 均케홈  部分林設定前으로붓터 生存 樹木  은 國의 所有로홈第五條  農商工部大臣은 左에 記載  箇所를 保安林에 編入을 得홈  一  土地壞崩流出防備에 必要 箇      所  二  飛砂防備에 必要 箇所  三  水害風害潮害防備에 必要 箇      所  四  頹雪墜石의 危險을 防備에 必      要 箇所  五  水源涵養에 必要 箇所  六  魚附에 必要 箇所  七  航行目標에 必要 箇所  八  公衆衛生에 必要 箇所  九  壇  廟  社  殿  宮  陵  園      又 名所或은 舊跡風致에 必要       箇所第六條  保安林을 盡代고 又 開墾    을 不得홈第七條  農商工部大臣은 保安林의 伐  木을 禁止고 又 制限을 得홈第八條  保安林에 編入으로 損害  를 蒙 森林所有者 其伐木을 禁止  된 境遇에 生 直接損害에 限야 補  償을 請求을 得홈  但國有林又 帝室林에 付야 此  限에 在치아니홈  前項에 補償은 保安林編入에 依야  直接의 利益을 蒙 者가 其責에 在홈第九條  農商工部大臣은 保安林編入  의 原因이 消滅거 又 公益上別  特의 事由가 有 時 此를 觧除을  得홈第十條  農商工部大臣은 保安의 必要  가 有 森林山野所有者에게 其造林  及保護를 命을 得며 所有者가 前  項에 依야 命令事項을 不遵 時  農商工部大臣은 此 行고 其費用  을 徵収며 或온 部分林에 編入을  得홈  項前部分林에 編入 者 本法第三  條及第四條의 規定을 適用홈第十一條  森林에 害虫이 發生거  又 發生 慮가 有 時 其森林所  有者 即時此를 驅除豫防홈이 可홈  前項境遇에 農商工部大臣은 害虫의  驅除又 預防의 必要가 有 處置를  該森林所有者에게 命令을 得홈  所有者가 前項의 命令을 不遵 時  農商工部大臣은 此를 行고 其費用  을 徵収을 得홈      〔未完〕

dcterms:title: It must be a matter of congratulation to all friends of Korea that the finances
dcterms:abstract: HERE AND THERE.It must be a matter of congratulation to all friends of Korea that the finances of the country have, under the hands of their late supervisor, been handled so well. The report printed in our last issue fully shows the condition of this department. We can only hope that, as the government has promised, the methods which have recently been in vogue will be continued. If this is true in the Finance Department the government need fear no embarrassment. If, however, this department be allowed to be handled loosely all others will feel the distress which will be occasioned

dcterms:title: 謹告庭請大臣
dcterms:abstract: 夫爲人之臣者ㅣ 紆黃타朱於太平無事之日야 富貴榮耀之極이 爲一世瞻視之壯而弗能立勳業之一崔巍며 弗能見志氣之一卓犖이라가 及其國破君危之日야 弗苟其難而能殺身成仁者 惟一晩節也니顧此韓國之今日컨 風景은 弗殊로 固非國破君危之日乎아 所謂國破君危가 東西歷史에 何勝屢指리오마 豈有此韓國韓君之一朝破危가 類若是者乎아 弗費半箭而全沒三千里金甌며 弗動一指而據奪五百年寶位가 在乎一使臣數語之間者 抑千古世界上初有變怪也니 苟何以至於斯哉오此非指默者之素所筭定이라 韓國之衮衮當局者ㅣ 無一非賣國誤君之狗彘輩爾라 吳之伯嚭와 楚之子蘭과 蜀之張松과 송之秦檜가 豈意鍾出於一時而爲指點者之奇貨者耶아 化翁之劇戱가 殆亦烈乎哉로다向日李參贊疏辭中에 有曰准亦亡亡不准亦亡이라되 吾儕 以謂與其准而불亡으론 寧若불准而亡이리오나 當此競爭之日야 弱的肉을 强的食은 例是當事로 至於今日之韓國은 固當有天下之公議라 豈可심심作一箇人頤下物也리오마然이나 國勢痿廢며 民氣綿軟야 불能哀呼一聲而遽作活埋之物이면 天下之公議 亦安得而激之哉리오見今韓國之勢 非但國破君危而已라 인種이 將至滅絶而乃已리니 쳥看불出數年之間에 波蘭猶太之禍 인인而復蹈호라 抉吾目懸之東門이어다 嗟嗟韓國之上下엔民은 上불忝祖宗은 姑舍是고 下爲子孫計者도 絶無一인焉야 當此國命符到之日而看作路인事고 萬口寒噤야 點血불沸니 此是國之運命歟아 民之暗昧歟아 抑亦指點者之旺氣歟아 咄咄何哉오惟今日庭쳥之元老公卿은 喬木世臣이오 簪纓巨室이라 世受國恩에 其德이 불斬며 身被君澤에 其業이 愈高니 到今所以報其國報其君者 一死而已라 死固불能濟其事로 鼓動萬民지怒瞻며 激起一國지熱血야 扶得塞天地지氣者 一死◈後에 其공이 益高며 其光이 益彰이니라 白首赤心으로 含笑歸泉야 拜見二十七世在天지靈이면 不亦榮哉며 一杯靑山에 題其墓道曰故忠臣某公지墓라면 豈有愧於岳飛文天祥陸秀夫哉아 惟元老公卿은 國지興亡과 事지成敗 付於天고 一心炳忠에 萬徃不退야 報國君以一死면 宗社지光輝오 子孫지陰騭이오 一國二千萬生命지根基也니 吾儕 第見諸公지爲臣民晩節지如何야 瀝酒而侑지호리라

dcterms:title: 司法
dcterms:abstract: ●司法本年三月十九日詔曰當此罕有之慶宜其有曠蕩之典六犯外懲役罪人審査情跡可以減等以示同慶之意事命下矣欽奉詔勅六犯外可以減等者修報之意訓飭各該裁判所矣京畿裁判所忠淸南道裁判所全羅北道裁判所慶尙北道裁判所黃海道裁判所慶興港裁判所濟州牧裁判所所管懲役罪人中六犯外可以減等者有無今玆報來故可以減等者合十四名別紙開具之意로 法部大臣이 上奏와 奉旨依奏別紙各裁判所所管懲役人犯中六犯外可以減等件京畿裁判所元致成 私掘匿屍罪 役七年 減一等五年盧命植 私掘匿屍罪 役五年 減一等三年鄭季玉 破碎厲祀壇罪 役二年 減一等一年半曹聖燁 破碎厲祀壇罪 役二年 減一等一年半忠淸南道裁判所李白用 劫寡隨從罪 役一年半 減一等一年朴命石 劫寡隨從罪 役一年半 減一等一年朴聖基 私掘破棺百里運屍罪 役五年 減一等三年朴聖學 假稱巡檢威脅勒掘罪 役七年 減一等五年金汝信 假稱巡檢脅人掘塚隨從罪 役一年半 減一等一年劉鳳孫 知人置標欲葬其親犯掘罪 役一年 減一等十個月鄭在河 匪擾隨從罪 役十年 減一等七年全羅北道裁判所 無乎慶尙北道裁判所金大根 私掘匿屍罪 役五年 減一等三年黃海道裁判所吳得權 失囚罪役一年減一等十個月崔學根 失囚罪役一年半減一等一年慶興港裁判所 無乎濟州牧裁判所 無乎 以上五月十八日

dcterms:title: 李柳公開
dcterms:abstract: ●李柳公開 漢城裁判所에셔 李承業柳成烈兩氏事案에 對야 公開裁判을 開 次로 該所에셔 再明日에 內外國紳商이 一齊來會야 孰是孰非를 公開審判다 其事實을 得聞 則如左니光武六年舊曆壬寅六月頃에 李承業氏가 單獨力으로 組織會社를 剏設야 軍服을 用達 彼事此事에 狼狽夥多야 蕩產 悲境을 當야 其年十二月에 其子李容喜와 其婿柳成烈로 事務를 干涉케바 物品과 財政은 李承業氏가 掌握야 年久信使 金龍伊로 出納고 事務主旋은 柳成烈이오 帳簿記錄은 李容喜오 物品進供은 姜胤周라 各各李承業氏의 命令로 從事 而已라 然바 元來同事業의 對야 一定 流通資本이 無으로 度支部의 先撥金과 各人處의 債入額으로 織組의 賃金과 物品의 購入等事를 上下撑石야 翌年正月二十日頃에 至야 冬服用達을 艱辛告竣얏고 癸卯正月二十日로 閏五月未日지 夏服用達을 了얏 以上은 李承業氏가 單獨力으로 營業바라 癸卯六月붓터 單獨力으로 支保기 難으로 新히 合名會社를 組織야 事務를 擴張지라 然 今日에 至야 意外로 李容喜가 柳成烈을 對야 言曰壬寅分의 細音을 㪅考 必要가 有니 互相調查기를 要請기로 柳答曰其時에 前後文簿가 君處에 皆在니 自意調查라얏더니 其後에 李曰瞭然 境界로 結筭를 㪅定 意로 約書를 作쟈기로 事甚無意 瞭然 境界로자 意思를 表示이라기로 不必要 贅約이나마 約定얏더니엇지 期約리오 約定後에 及야 瞭然 境界 鳥有에 竟歸고 滿紙奸惡의 非一非再라 債額만 沒數登載고 償還額은 全不計减지라 其內容을 見즉 壬寅年十一月以前〔即柳成烈이가 事務干與하기 前〕에 李承業氏가 彼事此事에 損害로 欠額이 三萬餘元（出秩에 宜載而不載하고〕이오 十二月以後로 正月二十日지 五十個日之間에 李承業氏가 入用 欠額이 八千餘元〔此만 出秩에 載하고〕에 達하얏슨즉 右兩欵欠額이 合計四萬餘元이은 此를 日記時在라 藉穪하고 入額秩에 添載하야 金類數를 增加케하며 又各項費用中에 二萬元은 明白히 支撥 處가 有거을 拔去하며 債入額中에셔 三萬餘元을 先報하얏 此를 償還秩에 不載지라 以上所陳바를 槪論진 實合計十餘萬元을 出秩에 不載하고 返히 九萬餘元이 領收額이라하니 是豈成說이리오大抵最初單獨力을 用達 時의 李氏의 未了 負債額이 本利合計六萬餘元을 李容喜가 合名會社金庫出納員으로 在야 合名會社의셔 得債先報얏더니 其後李容喜가 自家負債額中四萬元을 充納얏스나 尙不足額이 二萬餘元이되거늘 此 不報 譎計 暗生야 最初用達던 已結筭 帳簿 顚覆幻弄야 無理惡習을 惹起이라더라

dcterms:title: 官廳事項
dcterms:abstract: ●官廳事項黃海道管下郡守治蹟黃州郡守趙胤凞  熟路輕車로 久愈著績이라 劇邑大處에 賴此良手事○安岳郡守金容岳  大夫初政에 不卑吏治▣督稅種桑이 知所先務事○海州郡守鄭寅國  副梢良工이 利涉湖海라 露葭閣梅에 三見伊人事○平山郡守尹  泌  支站策應에 竭誠奉公고 凡百施措도 無適不宜事○鳳山郡守洪世泳  早年出宰에 有若老錬이라 感戴  恩造야 董刷  國課事○延安郡守閔泳原  政淸訟簡에 官民相孚라 一念振刷에 百度修擧事○谷山郡守  未差○瑞興郡守柳錫膺  重到錦樓에 絃誦猶聞리라 簿書計會에 餘暇說禮事○長淵郡守朴來勳  寛嚴互濟에 坐鎭島俗리라 吏畏民懷야 咸曰我侯事○載寧郡守  未差○遂安郡守尹致祚▣峽邑淸閑야 公庭如水라 暮年臥治에 鈴索不動事○白川郡守兪起濬  礦獘稅納를 報請纎悉리라鍊達幹當에 措處有方事○信川郡守李容弼  歷試茂著에 治成制定리라 具眼自在니 匪私伊公事○金川郡守金顯叅  孔路行政에 民方拭目라라 刷納無愆고 說獘亦詳事○文化郡守姜滿馨  兩歲治效요 一路聲譽라 聽訟平允고 行檢積勞事○豊川郡守丁憙▣  志切求蒭고 才恢游刃리라 闔境底平니 輿頌方蔚事○新溪郡守尹泰善  雅操慈諒고 素規雍容리라 邑小如斗에 政推于心事○長連郡守金炳定  古家儀範이요 獘局剸理라 蘊其前績야 施諸初政事○松禾郡守趙觀▣檢稅監礦에 實心實政리라 綜明剛柔가 一出誠信事○殷栗郡守李▣範  莅任屬耳에 佇觀來頭라 悃愊無華니▣此謹慤事○兎山郡守黃崙秀  奉檄便養에 日哦多暇라 鸞棲枳棘니 惜屈殘邑事○甕津郡守  未差○康翎郡守李錫黿  催科勤勵고 徯蘇懷綏라 發之政令에 自有條理事江原道管下郡守治蹟春川郡守金泳圭  貞痼向蘇고 紛錯이就整이라 老錬字撫之績이 旣著고 循良藹蔚之譽尤騰▣제○洪川郡守兪果煥公納은 一無愆滯고 邑樣이 百皆完備라存心保赤니 百里陽春이오 爲政廉白니 兩袖淸風이라 窃幸共濟에 唯恐或失이제○橫城郡守李範龍  不設雌黃고 咸稱廉白이라 仁政攸覃에 民曰賢侯이제○原州郡守宋文賢  五馬纔赴에 一臠可知라 持身儉約고 奉公謹愼이졔○平昌郡守朴龍勳  政淸事簡고 俗厚民厖이라悃愊無華에 邊幅不飾이졔○寧越郡守姜鳳元  邑僻松桂고 治覃蓽蔀라 殫誠監董니  碑閣에 竣工고 捐財存活니溝壑에 免飢▣졔○旌善郡守姜養秀  不煩不擾니 邑村이 無事고 以勤以誠니 報答이 有地라 暫遞旋仍▣旌民之福이졔○麟蹄郡守尹龜榮  美赴屬耳에 輿望이 拭目이라 叧成束吏之規고 益勉奉公之節이제○襄陽郡守金興基  蘊櫝令譽요 製錦良材라 貿米濟歉니 已聞活千之頌이오 按堵樂業니 尤喜登三之瑞이제○杆城郡守  未差○江陵郡守朴基鉉局鉅濱海고 邑頌得人이라 承積獘之餘니 正急改絃이오 値大歉之後니 幸賴慈航이졔○三陟郡守崔允鼎  宿研之地에 重莅고 專養之供이 不匱라 津民乍擾는 縱揭新聞나 海戶旋靖니 各安舊居이졔○蔚珍郡守尹宇榮  百方圖治에 七旬愈勤이라 躬巡賑貸니 千佛之活을 可驗이오 心勞撫䘏니 五袴之謠方騰이제○平海郡守張永煥  慈惠之譽旣著고綜核之政이 尤勵라 巡野勸農니 初無白丁遊食이오 捐俸濟飢니 擧喜赤子仰哺이졔○華川郡守任軒宰  公納焉無滯고 施措也有方이라 訟庭에 晝寂니 吏多睡鼾之暇고 峽村에 秋熟니 民有含哺之樂이제○金化郡守李源根  捐俸補獘고 戢技懲頑이라 時値豊穰니 尤貴三八政食이오 誠切報答니 仰祝千萬歲壽이제○平康郡守趙性載  爲政焉游刃餘地요 臨事則輕車熟路라 出自臺閣之列니 功存蘊素고 親閱簿牒之勞니 治驗保赤이제○鐵原郡守高運河  發諸儒雅之操고 濟以淳厚之治라 誦詩三▣篇니 材合製錦이요 捐廩六千緍니 惠洽蠲布이제（未完）

dcterms:title: 忠南公州新灘居金應七氏의 投函
dcterms:abstract: 日前에 本人이 鎭岑郡邑內新居崔聖坤氏를 訪問랴고 公州柳城市로 從야 鎭岑으로 來다가 路上에셔 日暮하얏대 鎭岑郡巡檢李河亨金鍾錫等이 稱以巡檢行爲로 泥醉昏倒야 脚步 不定고 意氣揚揚며 一平民을 捕繩으로 結縳야 前導고 來다가 本人을 見고 人事을 請기에 老兄은 太平시며 爲民警察에우 熱心시니 感謝외다즉 巡檢等이 以手打頰며 不問曲直고 蹴躑驅打며 以捕繩으로 緊緊結縳야 曰汝是平民으로 巡檢은 警察官吏인 何不進賜라 稱고 無難이 老兄이라야며 以軍刀背로 本人에 左右肩部 亂打기로 本人이 言되 無辜之民 如是驅打며 老兄之稱이 何關劣待인대 如是打之乎아 哀乞不已야도 終不聽施고 打頰蹴躑기로 不勝痛結야 昏倒仆地즉 巡檢은 各歸處所얏고 本人은 不省人事고 達夜昏倒얏시니 如是者類가 爲警察乎아 他邑人民을 如是虐打 時에 該區域內人民은 必不得生이온 此巡檢輩가 本是該邑吏屬이오 本人도 公州常民인즉 彼此常漢이 何尊誰卑乎아 一朝巡檢에 忽生士大夫之心야 昨日同類는 食肉吮血랴則만일警務官을면 末由之境이온 且置고 于先境內人民이 將至盡㓕이오 巡檢行爲를 略論면 飮酒行悖와 資其服裝之勢力고 打討民財와 平氏에게 壓制强制 一筆難記오 到處行惡이 甚於火賊이온則伏乞速爲揭載야 使我政府로 入聞是政케시기 伏望홈

dcterms:title: 訓查贜錢
dcterms:abstract: ●訓查贜錢  平理院裁判長李允用氏가 慶南觀察使趙民熙氏에게 訓令얏 貴管下昌原郡居金宗琪等이 該郡守尹泰興에 對 訴狀을 接准즉 內開에 本郡守尹泰興이가 一自莅郡以後로 民歛也討索也公錢幻弄也百般謀利야 闔境이 嗷嗷에 手足을 莫措니 當此開明之世야 不見天日이 何獨於昌原之民乎잇가 古書에 云居是邦에 不毀其大夫ㅣ나 然이나 至本郡守야 若無一塲呼冤則昌原之民이 其將盡劉故로 臚列齊籲오니 本郡守及甲結色吏金敬煥을 幷即押上야 逐條裁判야 一一推給야 以爲安堵之地等因인바 查此身爲命吏야 不恤民情고 專事貪虐야 至登民狀니 揆以法意에 極涉駭歎이라 到卽另定剛明郡守야 馳往該郡야 左開諸條를 查覈後에 具案報來 意로 玆에 訓令니 此를 依야 施行事      左  開錢四千兩癸卯各倉畓處稅租一百石加歛條每石四十兩式督捧乾沒事、錢七千一百四十三兩七錢五分昨年七月日穪云觀察巡察站下及雜下每戶一兩七錢五分歛民事、錢一千五百十一兩三錢穪云新開耕執稅升総奪民田畓徵稅事、錢一千六百九十四兩三錢四分甲午頉結中調查升総云作奸抑徵事、錢四千一百兩癸卯屯稅各人幻作甲結各人而甲結中作奸抑徵事、錢五千兩稱云隱結中觀察府納上甲結中執用乾沒事、錢一千五百九十六兩六分經理院外劃息駄條不報該錢所費無難乾沒事、錢三千兩安城金成五兄處白地抑奪事、錢一千六百兩守禦屯二十結抑徵該民乾沒事、錢六百四十兩前自如驛屬倉結八結作奸乾沒事、錢一萬兩穪云日語通辭每朔三十元式例給與各樣邑下方徵結民民難支保事、錢三萬六千五百兩甲結稅了刷於民間以不正名色錢充此上納數方張督刷民難支保事、錢五千兩明谷兪尙大處白地抑奪事、錢八千兩只耳盧泰允處白地抑奪事、錢一千兩金弘三處白地抑奪事、錢二千二百四十一兩金宗鎭金思珉等賣田中抑奪事、錢一千兩花谷李致安處白地抑奪事、錢五百兩班也洞李化五處百地抑奪事、錢五百兩西面辛禮谷處白地抑奪事、畓三石地只南面補畓外稱吏廳補助內懷肥已星火督賣事、已上鄕葉錢九萬五千二十六兩三錢五分、畓二石地只

dcterms:title: 鑛業許可
dcterms:abstract: ●鑛業許可農商工部에셔 四月二十九日붓터 五月一日지 許可 鑛業이 如左다 韓日人共同者 平安北道嘉山郡東北面, 西北面兩面에 在 黑鉛鑛 七十九萬一千六百十坪은 京城西部 居 白聖敬, 明應元, 山路署吉 等에게 外國人側에게平安北道龜城郡方峴面에 在 金鑛 五十九萬四千六百五十一坪은 京城本町 居 大橋淸三郞, 大里又太郞, 鈴本延吉 等에게忠淸北道沃川郡西面에 在 黑鉛鑛 二十七萬七千一百三十四坪과忠淸北道靑山郡西面에 在 黑鉛鑛 四十一萬一千一百二十五坪은 釜山港 居 島崎眞遂에게慶尙北道長鬐郡西面韓內의 兩面에 在 石炭鑛 四十九萬四千二十一坪은 釜山 居 角南宇太郞에게慶尙北道長鬐郡西面北面에 在 石炭鑛 十二萬坪은 慶尙南道密陽停車場 鈴木修, 田中與三郞에게平安北道龜地郡梨峴面에 在 黑鉛鑛 三十六萬坪은 平壤 居 松本哲材井正明에게忠淸南道公州郡南部面에 在 黑鉛鑛五十三萬二百坪은 京城 居 荒來地道에게忠淸北道靑山郡北面에 在 黑鉛鑛 十八萬一百十九坪은 京城 居 불욱부이콜레이소에게江原道江陵郡資可谷面에 在 黑鉛鑛 九拾九萬一千一百二十九坪은 京城 居 졔엣스틔목스에게

dcterms:title: 神鞭知常氏對韓經營（續）
dcterms:abstract: 別報神鞭知常氏對韓經營（續）◎然則韓國을 日本保護下에 管轄코져하면 輕暴히 改革치 勿하고 恩惠를 施하며 資力을 注入하야 保護를 成實지라 日淸戰爭時井上伯爵이 韓國에 公使로 在任 時에 余ㅣ韓國에 遊하야 同國上下의 狀態를 觀察하고 思惟하기를 日本에셔 韓國에 資金五六百万元을 給하야 國庫銀行을 組織하야 租稅를 掌케하고 又民間事業에 資金을 貸給하면 一은 歲入이 增加하야 韓國財政의 基礎를 堅實케하고 一은 韓國의 産業을 開發하고 一은 我國의 好意를 感動케하기에 便利하리라하야 井上伯爵에게 建議하얏더니 同伯爵이 曰余도 亦韓國에 資力을 注入하랴하나 赴任時政府에셔 資金을 出辦 道가 無하다하야 不得已今日에 至하얏스니 君이아모조록 速히 歸朝하야 一臂의 力을 助하라한 故로 余ㅣ歸國時에 廣島에 往하야 陸奧宗光氏에게 謀하고 其時伊藤總理를 說하야 三百万元을 出하게하얏더니무 事由이던지 末松謙澄氏가 此金을 持하고 韓國에 前往하야 銀行等組織하난 方法을 不行하고 韓廷▣貸給한 故로 最初目的을 達치못하얏난 現政府의 政策과 如히 財察顧問一人을 派遣하난 事로난 確然히 保護를 成實키 難한 則韓國을 保護하난 政策을 實行時에 韓國  皇帝셔 或不悅하시난 事도 有것이니 然則韓國  皇帝 懇切히 上奏하기를 日本이 征俄의 師를 起은 俄兵을 滿洲에셔 擊退하야 淸國의 保全을 期圖하고 併히 貴國擁護하기 爲이니 萬若俄兵을 滿洲에셔 如前跋扈跳梁케하면 貴國이 忽然히 呑噬의 禍를 遭하야 貴國의 命脉을 失아니라 我國運도 永히 完全치못것인 故로 貴▣의 獨立이 我日本의 獨立을 保하난 所以인 則我國과 貴國은 父子夫婦와 恰似히 和合提携하야 終生▣苦樂을 共同히것이로 萬若貴國이 此意가 無하고 我意에 反하야 他國▣屬하면 我日本의 國運을 完全 手段으로 不得已貴國에 對하야 斷然 手段을 行이 有것이니 此난 貴國의 大患이라 (未完）

dcterms:title: THE UNITED STATES VS. JOHN G. FLANAGAN
dcterms:abstract: THE UNITED STATES VS. JOHN G. FLANAGAN.The following is the statement and opinion of United States Consul-General Horace N. Allen, in the case of the United States against John G. Flanagan, who was charged with the murder of the late Geo. W. Lake, given by the Consul General as Acting Judge when he passed judgment on and sentenced the prisoner :THE CRIME?This murder was a peculiarly revolting one. The deceased was an old man, 53 years of age. His eyesight had almost failed him ; his voice was well nigh gone, and for some time prior to his death he had been rapidly failing in general health, so that on the day of the murder, he was scarcely able to return the salute of a passing friend. (See testimony of Thomas Hollingsworth), and had twice to be assisted ; once after falling down stairs at about 4 p. m. the day of the murder, and again at dusk, when he was taken sick at his door.THE MOTIVE.?The motive may have been robbery, concealment, or the hope of resultant gain.Robbery does not not seem to have been the motive since the house, a rented one situated in the Chinese Settlement at Chemulpo, was known to be almost depleted of its goods which had been taken to stock a new place in the Korean part of Chemulpo, to which the deceased was to have removed on the day or so following the murder. It was supposed by those acquainted with the deceased, that he had little if any ready money on hand, as he is known to have sold leather at a sacrifice a few days before the murder, in order to pay a pressing debt. (See sworn statement of the accused prior to arrest.) There was no disorder in the house such as would have been occasioned by the ransacking of thieves, except that a heavy wood box was overturned and some cooking utensils were upset in an out of the way place, as though by intention.The safe was found to be unlocked and the keys were not found in the pockets of the deceased but on the floor by the bed as though they had been used during the night. While this safe is not supposed to have contained much in the way of money or valuables that would attract an ordinary thief, it presumably did contain papers of some importance, none of which have been found after careful search. The deceased was a man of careful habits as to his property matters, and a long life of struggle and adventure and of undertakings of considerable importance, would lead hem to carefully preserve in his safe any papers of value he may have possessed. This safe was peculiarly difficult to open even with the proper key. The clumsy combination could not well be mastered by a novice. The accused was the culy person in Korea aside from the deceased who was known to be able to open the safe.CONCEALMENT. ?If robbery had been the motive, even robbery of the safe, it would not have been necessary to kill the feeble and almost speechless old man in the upper room. He could not even have called out to give an alarm. It seems evident that the motive was to obtain possession of something contained in the safe and to secure the unquestioned enjoyment of this possession by the removal of the rightful owner.What seems to have been a careful plan for concealment seems to have been carried out. Instead of using one of several American axes that stood near the bed, the crime was committed by the use of a heavy iron weight such as is used on Chinese steelyards. This weight is shown to have been introduced from the outside, though no trace was found of the place whence it was taken. That it was introduced to direct suspicion toward a Chinese as the perpretrator of the crime seems evident since it was placed in a conspicuous spot on the floor near the bed, It would have been a most simple matter to tose it through the open back window where it would have fallen down a steep bank and been lost in a tangle of underbrush and debris.A pair of binoculars taken from the safe, were carefully placed at the bottom of this bank where they would readily be seen and thereby direct attention to some thief who might be supposed to have dropped them from an overloaded pack. The glasses were not broken or damaged as by a fall. From the testimony of the Customs House employee who found them, it seems evident that they were not there the morning after the murder but were placed there the following night, where they were found on the morning of the first of September.A heavy woodbox, more or less filled with wood, was upset behind the stove, and heavy kettle was overturned from the stove to the floor, without making noise enough to disturb people thirty feet away who were supposed not to have been asleep at the time of the murder.It was shown that anyone being sufficiently acquainted with the house to be able to find the keys and open the safe, would not be apt to get so far out of the way in reaching the back door as to run against the stove and woodbox. While no light was observed in the house that night, it was a bright night at full moon and a person inside would have ample light from the spacious front windows for the purpose of committing this crime, while being unseen from the outside.HOPE OF CONCEALMENT. ?The accused was taken up by the deceased when the former was a penniless, friendless wanderer, and kindly treated. So much so as that accused said he was called by the deceased \"my boy,\" meaning son. He was set up in business by the deceased at a cost of yen 714., of which he stated that he had only returned yen 175., and that deceased held him responsible for the balance, and set him up in business again. (Sworn statement of accused prior to arrest.) The deceased placed the prisoner in charge of the new houses he was building in \"Korean Town\" to cost yen 1,000., and just prior to his death he had allowed accused to remove practically all his goods to one of these new houses which had been occupied of late by the accused, and to which the deceased was to have gone himself in a day or two.The prisoner states that he never gave his employer and account of those goods.The witness who saw accused first after the murder (testimony of Constable) stated that the latter had said to him that \"he had worked for Lake and never got a cent, but ´maskee´ have got letter.\" Another witness, Alfred F. A. W. Busby, deposed to the fact that the prisoner had stated to him that if Lake left a will he thought he, prisoner, would inherit the property.The accused is known to have practised the signature of the deceased until he had it passable correct. (Court Exhibits.) Letters to Edward Lake of Nagasaki, brother of the murdered man, were evidently written by Flanagan and some of them were presumably signed by him. The brother´s suspicions were aroused by these letters, which were reitterated demands for goods, and contrary to his brother´s usual methods. Further, the deceased wrote to his brother to know why he was sending him these goods which he had not ordered and did not want. If the deceased held a paper from the accused covering the shortage of goods to the extent of over yen 500., for which he was \"held responsible,\" or if the latter had used his habit of writing the former´s signature to make over to himself the stock of goods then in his complete possession at the other end of town; or if the accused had in the same way made a will, or knew of a will in his favor in the safe, all of which seems probable but has not been proved, the motive for the deed would apparently be concealment with the hope of resultant gain.LOCATION AND SURROUNDINGS.?The house in which the murder was committed is surrounded by Chinese shops. A room next door had been used as an opium den but was not occupied at the time of the murder. Some petty Chinese traders have their stands within a ＆ few feet of the front door of the house. The locality is a crowded one. Entrance to and exit from the back door is quite practicable for one knowing the locality well. The relations existing between the deceased and his Chinese neighbors were most excellent. He had befriended them in the past and had their good will, as is generally known. Suspicion was not directed to these Chinese after careful investigation, nor does there seem to have been any reason for suspecting them of robbing as empty house or of opening a safe which only an expert could open, and which was not supposed to contain valuables. Also the Court is of opinion that no Chinese would kill a man with one sure, steady blow, as was so nearly done in this case. A coward would have made sure of his work and caused more or less mutilation.SUSPICIOUS CIRCUMSTANCES.?The accused was seen to enter the house where the murder was committed at about the time of hang-lighting, and was not seen to come out. As the front door was found barred in the morning, be presumably did not come out that way. In his sworn statement, taken a few days after the murder, at a time when he knew himself to be under grave suspicion, accused solemnly swore that he was at home all the evening and night of the murder and was positive that he had not been out of his house during all that time. He was seen on the streets that night between nine and ten o´clock by three credible European and American witnesses, (testimony of Thos. Van Ess., H. K. Bostwick and E. E. Rittenhouse). He was seen between ten o´clock and midnight by Asiaties, (Testimony of Takahashi and Brothel Keeper) very drunk, visiting brothels and dressed in Chinese garments such as the deceased is known to have possessed, which garments he was offering for sale.Although given every opportunity to explain this discrepancy between his sworn satement and the actual facts, he has not done so,When awakened with difficulty at eight o´clock the next morning by the constable, who informed him of the death of his acknowledged friend and benefactor, he evinced neither surprise or sorrow, but took a glass of brandy, prepared to eat, and began to complain of the deceased and to claim that he had papers against him that would make him all right.When he came into the presence of the body he picked up the weight and examined it but promptly placed it back upon the floor. He afterwards swore that he had not even seen the weight, though he stated that he found the safe keys on the floor at the side of and about the middle of the bed, which was so near the place where the weight lay, that it the keys were there, he could scarcely have gotten them without touching the weigh. Later, when forced to notice the weight, he said. \"Well! I never saw that before,\" and voluntarily gave as his idea of the cause of death that \"he must have fallen and hurt himself.\" A rough miner who had presumbly seen death in many forms would know a a glance, as would anyone, that the body lying on the bed with a large hole in the head, could not

dcterms:title: The Minister of Foreign Affairs, Cho Pyengsik, reports to the Throne that
dcterms:abstract: The Minister of Foreign Affairs, Cho Pyengsik, reports to the Throne that Mr. Alexeieff, a Russian Financial Adviser, has arrived in the capital according to the request which was made by ex-Minister to Russia, Min Yungwhan. He further reports that he has an agreement with the Russian Minister, Mr. de Speyer, concerning the employment of said Mr. Alexeieff and he desires to know on what day the new adviser may commence his work in the Finance Dep´t His Majesty replied to the report as follows :?\"The report is hereby approved. All the financial affairs of the Treasury and the customs administration be carried on carefully by consulting with the Finance Minister. In regard to expenditures they must observe the seals and countersigns without making mistakes.\" (We do not quite understand the meaning of this edict, but we venture to say that it means the new Chief Adviser must consult the Finance Minister in all financial matters; and he must countersign all checks before the money is paid out from the Treasury)

dcterms:title: MR. R WILLIS REPORT ON HIS JOURNEY TO PEYNGYANG AND CHINNAMPO
dcterms:abstract: The local officials were also exceedingly courteous and considerate. On arrival I sent my interpreter to the office of the governor of the city, who is the administrator of the southern half of the province, to enquire when I might pay my respects to him. To my surprise the interpreter returned with the news that the governor was on his way call upon me, an honor that to an individual of my rank and standing was most unexpected. He turned out to be and extremely polite old gentleman, as indeed are almost all Korean officials; we were invited to luncheon next morning, and he was profuse in his apologies that owing to his being still in official mourning for the Queen he was unable to give us an evening entertainment with the orthodox attraction of a \"gisang\" dance, which appears to be the one sight worth seeing in this city. The commandant of the garrison, which consists of 400 men, who were at one time under Japanese instruction, also honored us with a visit.We left pyengyang in a native junk by which we proceeded to the new treaty port of Chinnampo. Between Pyengyang and Mankyeng-t´ai, a wooded bluff on the north bank about 4 miles below the city, the river runs through a low-lying and extensive valley forming numerous islands. There are frequent shallows, and this part of the river is only navigable for junks of any size at extreme high water. Mankyeng-t´ai is the highest point to which sea-going steamers can approach, and small vessels drawing from 8 to 10 feet of water are able to make their way thither, about 10 miles below this point is situated the small town of Posan, also on the right bank, the port to which the Korean Government steamers al present ply. They draw from 14 to 15 feet of water when fully laden, and ascend at any state of the tide; but navigation above Kichinpo is said to be difficult, the channel constantly shifting. The country between Posan and Pyengyang is extremely fertile, and foreigners who have passed through it state that all the available ground is cultivated, and that with a care that is unusual in this country. In the future either Mankyeng-t´ai or Posan will probably be connected with Chinnampo by a line of small steamers and come to hear the same relation to Pyengyang as Ryongsan does at present to Seoul, and in my opinion it would both be convenient and advantageous to commerce that one or even both these places chould be allowed to use as \"ports of call.\" Kichinpo, about 5 miles above the bent at Chelto island the next point of interest on the river. It has frequently been suggested as possibly the best position for treaty port on the inlet. It is 20 miles nearer Pyengyang, it can be reached by vessels of 20 feet draught at all states of the tide, the objectionable mudflat is absent, and it possesses a particularly favorable site for settlement purposes. Its disadvantages are firstly that the navigations above Chelto Island is very difficult; the river narrows above the end, and the ◈◈b, which is very strong at all points of the mie◈, here flows with extreme violence, us much as 6 or 7 knots an hour having been potcently been reported. The second drawhack is that the country behind the port is mountainous, and overland communication with Pyengyang, from which it is about 40 miles distant, is far more difficult then in the case of Chinnampo.(To be continued.)

dcterms:title: 李在明控訴公判記
dcterms:abstract: ●李在明控訴公判記（一）李在明以下諸連累者의 第二審公判은 昨報와 如히 再昨日午前十時五分에 京城控訴院第一庭에셔 開고 如式의 審查를 畢 後首犯李在明으로 爲始야 次第審問 裁判長이 先히 辯護士李冕宇氏의 請求를 依야 辯護委任與否를 李在明에게 問즉 李 䀚然勵聲야 曰原來辨護를 依賴 目的은 一은 人人이 舉皆法律知識을 有치못야 關係点을 指摘치못과 一은 當事者ㅣ迷亂야 自己의 事實을 井然陳供치못으로 旁觀的專門家에게 辨論을 委任이라 然則余에게 辨護委托을 受 人은 余의 行事原因을 陳노라고 自然我國의 現狀과 諸政治問題를 論것이오 事實을 辨護노라고 李完用殺害를 正當다 論것이어늘 裁判長은 此로 政治問題▣公安妨害니 禁止니 此 公判에 辨護를 許 本意가아니라 今番은 辨論自由를 侵害치말나고 委任을 諾더라、李在明은 心身不安을 穪托고 觧縛을（入塲時叫號踊躍을 因야 被縛된 者）請얏 辯士도 繼續請許으로 裁判長은 檢事의 反對를 不顧고 依請더라、裁判長이 被告等에게 勿爲失軆라고 李在明起訴事實을 朗讀 後審問을 始얏 其內容은 前第一審과 如히 李完用에게 對 謀殺未遂首犯、李容九에게 對 謀殺未遂從犯、朴元文에게 對 故殺已遂러라、被告李在明은 請茶救渴後應問答審 最先朴元文故殺事에 對야 殺死의 字義不同을 論야 曰朴元文이비록 余刀에 死얏스나 此 余가 故意로 殺이아니라 李完用을 殺랴다가 釼鋒이 誤히 朴元文에 及이니 譬諭컨 農夫가 田에셔 雜草를 除다가 誤히 稻를 傷이라 此를 指야 稻를 不愛고 故除이라 穪이 可乎아 余가 其時에 李完用以外를 殺 意가 有지면 應當前後左右에 羅列 多數不共戴天之讎를 殺것이지 豈히 無知無能야 勞働 可憐諸物을 殺리오고 次에 當日現狀을 述야 曰余가 早朝에 新聞을 見고 即時束裝고 佛蘭西敎堂에 前往야 其門前北便路側에셔 徘徊얏더니 約五六分後에 閉式되야 叅席諸賓이 紛然散歸 趙重應、朴齊純等諸賊은 有나 李賊은 無지라 新聞이 誤報줄 知고 東路로 向야 歸家랴 際에 李賊이 出門乘車야 將欲馳驅으로 時乎를 暗叫면셔 飛身當前야 揮刀一擊고 連續行剌다가 巡查에게 左股를 傷 後仆地失▣얏 其後警視廳에셔 打之敺之야 諸嚴惡刑을 無一不加면셔 失神喪精中亂供바를 記而爲供고 故殺重罪에 謀陷나 實則前述이오 此를 知은 其後完用家에 縛去얏슬 時니 余가 趙賊重應에게요녀셕 一辱을 當고 彌天積忿을 不勝야 一擊之下에 搏殺랴나 身被重傷 中縛如屍身으로 不得已咬牙一號 際에 一老嫗가 頓足哭踊면셔 哀此朴也ㅣ死矣▣으로 始知얏노라고 李東秀와 同行與否에 對야 極力否認되 其時同行 者 忠憤二字이라고 其理由에 對야 曰余가 此意를 懷은 距今六年前乙巳條約締結時인 以來로 完用은 少無忌憚고 肆暴肆惡이 日益劇甚야 至于今日天地所不容 八大罪를 作으로 忍恕不得야 畢竟下手얏 其八大罪 一은 五條約을 締結야 外部를 廢고 統監府를 迎이니 此 我檀箕神聖族의 舌를 斷고 耳目을 閉고 自由를 奪이라 其罪可殺이오、二 海牙密使事件을 藉托고 宋秉畯과 共謀야 伊藤博文의 許可를 得 後  御前에 肆進야 宋賊으로 拔劒威脅케하고 自己 三次懇請타가 不允심으로 三次號令하야 傳位케하얏스니 此 君父의 冕冠을 力奪이라 其罪可殺이오、三은 七條約을 締結야 諸般權力을 統監에게 賣하고 軍隊지 觧散이니 此 世所共知 現狀을 因作야 國家民族으로 永滅케이라 其罪可殺이오 四 年幼신  皇太子殿下를 日本에 送하고 日人에게 娶케 運動이니 此 幼穉 精神을 換人하야 將來에 利用을 作랴이라 其罪可殺이오、五  太上皇陛下를 渡日케랴 運動이니 此 法▣이 安南王을 捕去야 南亞米利加州太守를 封과 如이라 其罪可殺이오、六은 嚴冬雪寒을 不拘고 西北巡行을 行시게이니 此 我國人의 尊皇心이 與他特異으로 後日日本으로 移 時에 藉托件을 作야 暗中行事랴이라 其罪可殺이오、七은 司法權을 委任이니 此 國內諸忠良을 謀殺고 人民動靜을 箝制이라 其罪可殺이오、八은 外面으로 一進會長李容九로 聲明書를 頒佈케고 內面으로 合邦을 運動이니 此 二千萬生靈을 太平洋에 浮고 四千年宗社를 北海道에 移이라 其罪可殺이라얏스며

dcterms:title: HOPEFUL SIGNS
dcterms:abstract: HOPEFUL SIGNS.Setting aside the political situation of this country we are greatly encouraged with the gradual development of commerce, industry, education and the rapid propagation of Christianity. There are now four foreign banks in this city beside two small native institutions. The oldest and one of the most reliable banks here is the Dai Ichi Ginko which has branch offices in Seoul as well as in Chemulpo. It was the first banking house established in the capital after the opening of the country. During the past ten years the bank has proved itself to the public to be thoroughly trustworthy and almost all the foreign residents here are its depositors. There is another Japanese bank ―which has a branch in this city and which is a much smaller institution than the Dai Ichi or the first bank, although it does good business among the Japanese merchants and some Korean tradesmen.The well known and one of the greatest banks of the East―The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Co-operation ―opened its branch offices in Chemulpo last year. The step has proven to be very satisfactory from the start. It deals largely with the Chinese merchants in Korea and many foreigners and some wealthy natives are its depositors. Now we have the Russo-Korean bank in Seoul and it is almost a certainly that the newcomer will soon be one of the chief banking houses in Korea.The trade condition of the different ports for the last two mo◈ths is more encouraging than it ever has been ; it is really satisfactory. The customs receipts are constantly on the increase and if this keeps up all through the year the total amount will be calculated by seven figures at the end of the current year. We are told that many new lines of imports find markets in the interior and the Koreans begin to raise many articles for export purposes.The railway between Seoul and Chemulpo will soon be an accomplished fe◈ and when it is completed we will be sure to notice a marked activity in commerical enterprises. The line between Seoul and Euiju is now surveyed by the French engineer and the company of Five Lille will fulfill its contract by building the road as rapidly as circumstances will permit. This new line of railway communication through the richly mineral deposited country in the Northwest no doubt will open up various mining and agricultural enterprises.The American mining concession in the North is being worked gradually and when it proves to be a paying enterprise the result will be not only beneficial to the promotors but to Korea as well. The German firm which has a concession of gold mines (when they are located) is now taking steps to send a German mining engineer to the interior to prospect. The Russian party who has the concession of coal and gold mines in Hamkyeng Do will probably develop his localities before long.Even the Koreans begin to possess the spirit of enterprise, so much so that an electric street car company has been formed in this city. Before long we may enjoy moonlight excursions from the South gate to the new imperial grave. The same company intends to light the city with electricity. This might be bad news to the oil companies but it is delightful to anticipate the luxury of writing copy under the brilliant rays of the modern illuminator.Educationally speaking the various journals in this city and elsewhere, published in vernacular form, have done a lion´s share of good in instilling new ideas into the minds of Koreans. Through these journals the people are beginning to comprehend the different conditions and phases of foreign nations and daily occurrences of political, social and economical events throughout the world. This has great effect in broadening their ideas, in expanding the horizon of their views and in elevating the plane of their thoughts.The natural aptitude possessed by the Korean youth for acquiring foreign languages is admirable, while their ◈ratorical gift and logical reasoning powers are equal to those of any race.We have heard of a great many imposters under the pretense of being Christians among the natives but at the same time we also hear of thousands of noble Christians who live up to their faith under the most trying conditions.The only subject which makes us despair is the politics of the country

dcterms:title: 叙任及辭令
dcterms:abstract: 官  報●叙任及辭令  命宮內府特進官叙勅任宮一等  從一品沈相薰○和陵叅奉金永學  咸鏡北道觀察府主事韓冕鉉  濟州牧主事金根著  軍部主事宋憲奎  依願免本官○任  和陵叅奉叙判任官八等九品李鍾元○稱慶時禮式事務委員李容翊  命  稱慶時禮式事務委員副長○任咸鏡北道觀察府主事叙判任官六等  金秉禹○任濟州牧主事叙判任官六等  申海均○任軍部主事叙判任官六等  成樂元    以上八月十日惠民院主事趙範植  仝尹弼求  仝姜錫鼎  仝李說濟  仝崔圭璿  仝李建鎬仝金永斗  仝李喆鎔  軍部主事成樂元內部主事李鍾崙  忠淸南道觀察府主事李熈榮  忠淸北道觀察府主事張景植慶尙北道觀察府主事李秉祐  依願免本官○金基珍  徐龜河  金準錫  千世爀李容南  丁昇燮  趙龜元  洪弼厚  任惠民院主事叙判任官六等○任軍部主事叙判任官六等  李懋鉉○任內部主事叙判任官六等  李鍾河○任忠淸南道觀察府主事叙判任官六等  沈鳳澤○任忠淸北道觀察府主事叙判任官六等  金鳳昊○任慶尙北道觀察府主事叙判任官六等車日煥    以上八月十一日陞從二品  正三品朴鏞和  仝嚴柱益仝玄學杓○陞正三品  六品李鳳魯  仝鄭寅琥  仝河相駿  仝崔洪錫  仝金永珪  仝金秉洙  內部叅書宮李根沐    以上一月九日從二品李容觀  度支部財務官成光鎬任中樞院議官叙勅任官四等○商工學校敎官崔奭鎭  仝鄭泰馹  仝姜纘秀  仝曹秉根  仝安漢鎭  仝申昌均  吉州監理署主事李範錫  仝李世鉉  軍部主事李懋鉉  內部主事李鍾河  依願免本官○金永厦  金性漢  李啓龍  高濟益李喆薰  李▣七  任商工學校敎官叙判任官六等○柳東敎  兪鎭昌  任吉州監理署主事叙判任官六等○任軍部主事判任官六等  金斗洙○任內部主事叙判任官六等  池鍾浩    以上八月十一日軍部主事金斗洙  內部主事池鍾浩  忠淸南道觀察府主事沈鳳澤  忠淸北道觀察府主事金鳳昊  依願免本官○軍部主事叙判任官六等  趙恒善○任內部主事叙判任官六等  宋欽肅○任忠淸南道觀察府主事叙判任官六等  申炳均○任忠淸北道觀察府主事叙判任官六等  朴瑞夏    以上八月十二日

dcterms:title: 楊市論告와 辯護
dcterms:abstract: 雜      報●楊市論告와 辯護  去五日午前十一時에 平壤地方裁判所新義州支部에셔 楊市事件으로 被逮 黃菊保、宋子賢、黃菊晚、張竹燮、趙奉國、金桂宗、韓永걸、金基亨、李根赫、李成學、李世漢、鄭承祿、安奉國等의 第三回公判을 開廷고 証人龍川府尹金祥演、財務署長柳熙晋、警部金永걸、該洞長金尙玉等諸氏를 次第訊問 後小林裁判長이 被告等의 事實과 証據의 調查를 終了 旨를 告 橋本檢事가 論告기를 被告等이 市塲稅를 反抗기 爲야 共謀暴動얏슨즉 其行爲가 刑法大全第六百七十七條에 該當다얏고 辯護士安秉瓚氏 一塲辯論얏 其槪要 大抵本件의 原因이 二가 有니 一은 市塲稅에 對야 稅額을 市塲에만 徵収아니라 外他常設店에도 徵収코져이오 一은 金融이 枯渴고 經濟가 恐慌야 一般商業界의 困難이 最甚 此時代에 無든 稅額을 徵▣ 故라 此二原因에 基야 楊市商民等이 當該官廳에 請願코져 頃 有얏스나 决코 暴動야 安寧秩序를 紊亂케 行爲 無지라 被告等이 皆是實業家가야니면 學生인 其性質이 淳良고 品行이 端止것은 旣往調査에 徵여도 明白거니와 審問時에 其貊들 觀고 其言을 聽여도 可히 洞悉바오 被告等의 犯罪의 事實이 無은 証人金祥演、柳熙晋、金尙玉의 証言에 照야 明白 今此檢事의 論告에 被告等이 共謀야 暴動얏슨즉 刑法大全第六百七十七條에 該當다나 盖共謀라은 二人以上이 密計을 謂이오 暴動이라은 凶器를 携帶고 亂暴 行爲를 行 者를 謂이라 被告等이 密計야 亂暴 行爲를 行 事實과 証據가 本無거 何를 依據야 共謀暴動이라 指稱지 極히 訝惑지라 如斯히 人民의 自由를 拘束코져즉 人民이엇지 其生命財產을 一日이라도 安堵리오 以此觀之면 檢事의 論告 正當타 謂키 難지라 且被告等의 情狀을 回顧면 拘留를 被지 累朔에 其間隆冬을 銕窓暗黑騫에셔 經過얏스니 其若楚도 不可形言이어니와 被告等은 皆是生業에 從야 仰事俯育 者類라 其父母妻子가 誰들 依賴야 延命리오 其情狀이 如此히 慘酷더러 被告等이 非其罪로 縲絏中에 在것을 本辯護人은 目擊고 窃히 同情의 淚를 禁키 難지라 以上陳述과 如히 被告等이 何等의 刑法上責任이 無즉 無罪判决하것이 妥當이라 裁判長曰本件의 審問을 結了하얏스니 來九日午前拾時로 判决宣告하다하고 仍히 閉廷얏 時 午後四時零이라 當日傍聽人이 二百名以上에 達 故로 公判廷이 狹隘하야 入廷 者ㅣ拾分의 一에 不過얏다더라

dcterms:title: The Mai-il Sinmun delivers itself in the following editorial
dcterms:abstract: The Mai-il Sinmun delivers itself in the following editorial.\"Last Friday, the 19th inst., one of our editorial staff was summoned to the Foreign Office by the order of the Minister. The members of the office were profuse in their congratulations on the success of our paper saying that it was indispensible to the country. then came the following dialogue.:F. O.:\"We don´t know how, but you have succeeded in reproducing in your journal the official communications between our office and foreign legations. There is danger of divulging the secrets of state. the two legations whose communications you have made public have repeatedly demanded why we allowed office secrets to be published in the Mai-il Sinmun and the Kanjo Shimpo, the copies of which they have sent us as proof. We are much troubled on this account.\"Editor; \"In the first place, the Minister for the Foreign Affairs is not a foreigner, nor does this office belong to a foreign nation. How is it then that you should carry on secret negotiations with foreign legations while keeping them dark to your own people? In critical times like these if such a trifling affair troubles you, how can you expect to die for the country when foreign powers should invade her with an army? You tell me that the papers give you a deal of trouble. Would it be right for us to speak only in the interest of foreign powers and not for the benefit of Korea?\"F. O.:\"Not so. But as we have to send replies to the two legations on the subject, we want to consult you concerning the best way of answering them.\"Editor: \"Then simply tell them that as you and the editors are the subjects of Korea, and as well we all interested in maintaining the integrity of the country, the foreign legations have no right to interfere with our actions.\"\"The gist of the complaints made by the legations was that it was wrong to let the public know what had been told the Minister in confidence and that the editor of the journal should be punished for publishing the same. ***It is all right for the said legations to forward the interest of their own nations. But we deem it improper to demand in an official document the punishment of him who may speak for the good of his own country. Our officers and people are this much advanced; and we sincerely hope our foreign friends will treat us little differently than before, so as to promote the amicable relations existing between Korea and other countries.\"[We publish the above free translation of the editorial of our daily contemporary not because we indorse all that it ways nor because we are in any way responsible for the opinion therein expressed. We give it only to show our foreign readers what Young Korea is thinking about the relation of the people and the government.―T. H. Y.]

dcterms:title: 勅令第十九號
dcterms:abstract: ○勅令第十九號警視廳官制第一條 警視廳에 左開職員을 寘홈警視總監 一人 勅任警視副監 一人 勅任或奏任警視 專任十二人 奏任警察醫 專任五人 奏任或判任警部 專任五十八人 判任第二條 警視総監은 內部大臣의 指揮監督를 承야 皇宮, 漢城府及京畿에 在 警察, 消防及衛生事務를 掌理고 各部主務에 關 警察事務에 對야 各部大臣의 指揮監督를 承홈第三條 警視総監은 管內警察事務에 關야 職權範圍內에셔 廳令을 發을 得홈第四條 警視総監은 部下官吏를 指揮監督고 高等官의 賞罰은 內部大臣에게 具報고 判任以下의 進退 專行홈第五條 警視総監은 警察署長, 警察分署長의 處分又令命이 規成에 違야 公益을 害거나 權限을 侵犯 者가 有으로 認 時 其處分命令을 繳消거나 或 停止을 得홈第六條 警視総監은 內部大臣의 認許를 得야 分課規定을 設을 得홈第七條 警視副監은 警視総監을 補佐고 警視總監이 事故가 有 時 其職務를 代辦홈第八條 警視 上官의 命을 承야 廳務를 掌고 部下官吏를 指揮監督홈第九條 警部 上官의 指揮를 承야 廳務에 從事고 部下를 指揮監督홈第十條 警察醫 上官의 命을 承야 衛生警察事務에 從事홈第十一條 漢城府及京畿內에 警察署及警察分署를 置되 其位置及管轄區域은 內部大臣이 定홈第十二條 警察署長은 警視 又 警察分署長은 警部로 充홈警察署長及警察分署長은 上官의 命을 承야 署務를 掌理고 部下를 指揮監督홈第十三條 警視廳에 巡査를 置되 判任官待遇로 홈巡査에 關 規程은 內部大臣이 定홈第十四條 內部大臣은 必要에 應야 預筭範圍內에셔 警視廳에 技師, 繙譯官, 技手及繙譯官補를 寘을 得홈附則第十五條 本令은 隆煕二年一月一日붓터 施行홈第十六條 光武十年勅令第八號 警視廳官制 廢止홈

dcterms:title: 溫和答辯
dcterms:abstract: 놀氏의 本社寄函를 接讀즉 向日萬壽聖節에 韓人이 羣集於闕門外인 바 適有一犬야 突入其中니 韓人이 驚㥘而走어날 因此驚㥘야 一羣이 皆驚㥘而走지라 氏가 對此論評얏스되 韓國內日本保護權이 將止於虛名 時日以前에 能히 發展될 響導의 原質이이 多有기를 難可望이라 얏더라日本軍人及巡査가 爲其維持秩序야 必多集同地얏스리니 韓人의 自日人所受를 商量면 一韓人의 驚走가 足以驚一群은 不足驚異라 이 豈其不可리오 且吾人이 可以記憶 거슨 雖開明邦國에라도 如彼驚動이 極小事端으로 從生이 亦有이니 驚擾原因을 不知이 與此無異어날 今此細小之端에 加如彼論證은 似甚太重이로다美國人의 懦㥘을 對야 如此論評을 有人必加리니 루클닌 美國內一道橋路에셔 一箇病人으로 경走가 從生야 六箇人의 生命을 虛費얏지라 何地何人이던지 如此히 急경기가 甚昜도다韓國內에 響導原質이 空乏이라 을 寄書人의 誤失이라고 不稱노니 彼或可也나 然이나 其所說明은 出於不幸이로다 韓人을 世人이 常以懦㥘量度나니 此 非他라 韓國人民이 特其東洋政治之下에셔 如彼久苦야 試圖改良 거에 未有强硬後應을 確知이니 如此情形은 淸國印度波斯와 及其東洋全幅이 幾乎同一야 日本常民이 亦大同於此라 雖爭鬪之際에라도 一人이 若被攻擊이면 不以獨自敵禦고 同力者六七人을 常招이 其乃本性이로다韓人도 信依 引導者를 或得 거시 有時矣니 伊時勇壯은 不下於他人을 表示矣로되 引導者의 懦弱無能을 彼若疑訝면 一般外國人의 當行之事를 亦行도다此地外人商會에 被雇韓人을 試觀지여다 後有權限及勢力을 自知으로 强硬行止가 與日人同一에 日인을 無所忌라 如此事 本記者之所目覩니 能證其實하노라韓國인民에게도 日人所有의 後應을 供給면 향導及忠愛의 不足을 不得見리라 士耳其에 아멘이앤인과 俄國에 猶太民이 有其◈人上勇壯인지 或有誰疑訝乎아 韓國人의 情形이 實是與彼一般이로다

dcterms:title: 淸客投書
dcterms:abstract: 外國通信⊙(淸客投書)去月二十七日에 日本時事新報社에 投書一封이 來엿 此投書 思量컨 日本에 在留 淸國開化黨에 書인듯다더라 其書를 左開노라近日支那變政、勇往改革獘政、支那全國豪傑忠義之士、莫不稱快、以爲轉弱爲强之大機關、但支那今日朝野人、分兩黨、一爲改進開新黨、人多仁勇智義之輩、其學問識見議論最高明、能興起國勢、此黨人多曉交際格致之學、立心以救民强國爲務、多家在楊子江東南上下各省地方、卽各省督撫政府、必依其發議論行事、乃克有濟、如違背其言、則必大放聲譽、不久當退位、此黨人在朝少、在野者多、以此黨人仗義執言、幷非若頑貪舊黨人之敗壞國家、貪官虐民也、以此故、民間推重新黨人、卽如大官張之洞、陳寳箴、鄧華熈、邠壽豊胡聘之、京官王文韶、張蔭桓、李端棻、孫家鼐、各大臣、北洋榮祿諸人、皆依新黨、以取聲譽、支那皇帝、聖明天縱、勇果有爲、近日改革之事、無有不善、深洽民心、其最得力者、因有某氏大臣、進呈舊時已死一大有名人、馮桂芬氏所著書、校  廬抗議、預言改革政事、皇帝見之倣行、即近所行者、多在把議書中廣東康有爲、平素喜爲大言、見識亦明、任事亦勇、開新黨人愛之、命康有爲同弟子、梁啓超爲先鋒開路、諸豪傑繼之於後惟朝政前在舊黨人握中、必除去舊黨乃可施行舊黨一人最爲貪汚昏暗、絕無愛國保民之心、使支那國家、屢受羞辱之事此黨舊人、只知賄賂、不識忠義、近見支那皇帝、爲開新黨主、新黨勢力日大、則舊黨人必退位、因此日夜謀爲判逆、必先執縛綑制皇帝、乃可漸殺新黨人、乃假借皇太后之命、權理國政、實則行同叛逆、囚限皇帝權力、使不得展爲、所以不敢即殺皇帝者、恐怕各各地方新黨義士、起兵打攻京城、殺國賊、報君仇、今日之拿捉中、以康有爲新黨一魁傑梁啓超亦同、舊黨必先殺新黨人解散新黨勢力、然後敢行、弑逆、或度皇帝、別立新帝之年幼者、以便舊黨人握權位新黨人喜結交日本、英吉利、米利堅、各國、舊黨人喜陰結俄羅斯、與法蘭西國、幷聞私通俄羅斯、賣國與之、此爲中日一大關係、伊藤侯爵、今在支那北京、宜力救出梁啓超、扶助新黨人、此有益日本之一大助幷宜宣言、保助支那皇帝復權、則後日支那日本邦交史加厚矣    不得已人記

dcterms:title: 學校趣旨
dcterms:abstract: ●學校趣旨  肅川郡居吳尙俊氏가 與該郡同志諸氏로 特設私立學校고 趣旨書를 送致얏기로 如左揭記야 來頭實效를 攅祝노라大凡人이 世에 生면 錢이 翼이라 故로 古之聖訓에도 財以發身고 今之俗諺에도 錢爲項羽라니 可爲得格之言也라 何者오 昨日則權路出身이 此에 由더니 今日則學問發達이 亦此에 由니 此則天理에 常然이라 然이나 其所憾情은 口不可盡謂也로다 嗚呼라 現天下文風이 大闢야 文野之別이 天壤에 截若니 此時之急務가 學外莫先이라 雖然이나 力이 有 人도 或因不知而不行고 知가 有 人도 或因無力而未行니 事之相左가 胡爲此甚고 竊庸慨歎에 胆裂을 不勝지로다 本人等도 亦是貧寒孤踪이라 自入一進會來로 于今三四春秋에 識見이 別無이나 外邦에 美를 取며 內國에 勢를 察 則文明時代가 怳然無疑지라 昏昏之域에 夢을 醒고 進進之學에 慮가 有야 學習에 方針을 夙霄에 研究호 寒袍獘衫에 赤手를 難措니 心膓沸熱을 不能自禁이라 坐輒盟約이되 所意未就면 誓不留此世러니 百般做計로 竟히 如意을 不得이라 胆冷氣塞야 將欲入山僻居야 麋鹿을 爲友라가 翻然更思則見孔斫梃이 似近於吾人故로 傳學私立學校을 別處에 設立고 新學問書籍을 專數購來야 爛討觧得而做課며 兼且童蒙을 聚集敎育 意로 定議立約니 此乃無力而學進之計也라 盖學之爲學은 學而知之와 困而知之가 遲速은 想必有先後이나 及其至也則一也니 幾個同志가 若無心則已어니와 其所熱血則古有拾螢穿壁而成者니 今亦警枕刺股而做去則其何古今이 相殊哉아 夬得劣中之優計故로 書籍은 即速購來이며 以此磊劣經綸으로 作此麁拙章草야 先自宣言이 愧恧者多矣오나 今此發表 欲求身勢相同氣味相似之友야 歃血同盟고 期得實効 意로 經營課目을 左開仰佈오니 本郡各面與隣近邑지라로 若有同流願從之員則今月晦內로 來問于本郡會所심을 千萬伏祝    發起人  肅川郡居  金用翊      金秉樞  全碩禧  吳尙俊      贊成員  崔得煥  康極三

dcterms:title: 法律第十九號
dcterms:abstract: ○法律第十九號  刑法大全中左갓치  改正홈              （續）第三百二十九條乃至第三百三拾三條   削除홈第三百二拾九條乃至第三百三拾三條   削除홈第三百三十四條中「左開五項」을 左開  三項」으로 改고 第四項及第五項  을 削除홈第三百三十五條 左갓치 改홈第三百三十五條  第三百三十四條    諸項의 所爲로 因야 罪囚 死刑    에 致 者 第四百七拾九條鬪敺    殺人律이나 第五百十一條鬪敺傷    人律에 依야 一等을 加이라第三百三十六條 削除홈第三百三拾七條但書及第三百三十八  條 削除홈第四編第三章第拾五節乃至第拾八節  을 削除홈第四編第四章第一節의 節名中「報」  「事」로 改홈第三百四拾七條乃至第三百四拾九條   削除홈第三百五拾一條 左갓치 改홈  第三百五十一條  官司의 公文이나  記錄을 增减 者 懲役七年이며 未  施行 者 一等을 减이라第三百五十六條中「懲役一年」을「笞  一百」으로 改홈第四編第四章四節을 削除홈第四編第四章第六節及第七節을 削除  홈第四編第四章第九節을 削除홈第三百八拾二條中「禁獄」을「懲役」으  로 改홈第三百九十二條中「笞五十」을「懲役一  年」으로 改홈第三百九十六條中「고 鎔化 者  懲役三年에 處」 削除홈第三百九十七條及第三百九十八條  削除홈第四編第五章第二節을 削除홈                      （未完）

dcterms:title: 賀圖書舘創立 續
dcterms:abstract: 尋常讀書社會에 ◈恨乏力야 難以購備圖書라 其渴望이 大旱의 雲霓을 望과 如니若有圖書舘이면 窮措大貧書生이라도 無此缺望리니 此 圖書舘이 學校外에 在야 開進文化의 大機關이되 者가 六也오第七은 圖書舘에셔 閱覽 者가 地球各國의 近況을 速知 利 得이라 今日世界에 文明이 日進니 吾不能安於固陋야 自同井底와 矣리비록 有時로 百般職業에 驅使바될지라도만일 地球近況을 悉知야 諸文明國으로더부러 競爭치못면 必有所敗라 圖書舘이 文明世界에 新刊圖書와 新報와 雜誌類 廣藏니 出入此舘者로야 금不敢作劣敗汚名之事리니 豈不美哉아 此 圖書舘이 學校外에 在야 開進文化의 大機關이되 者가 七也오第八은 圖書舘이 不知不覺에 ◈成人材 利가 有이라 嘗觀出入圖書舘者가 自然히 勤독 書之志가 生야써 智識을 養成니 盖學者가 每入圖書舘이면 固欲硏究事物이라 前後左右에 悉皆硏究物이니 勤勉之意가 何得不生이라오不獨此也라 事物을 愈硏究愈精細면 意見이 愈卓絶고 材器가 愈宏大을 可知니 其爲利가 豈不大哉아 此 圖書舘이 學校外에 在야 開進文化의 大機關이되 者가 八也라 其餘之利가 固不止此나 不暇枚擧라얏스니今에 大韓諸君子도 此報의 論列 졔條利益을 到底觀念야 圖書舘의 新設을 奬勵며 其擴張을 贊助야 敎育事業이 完備倂進케을 切切企望노라完

dcterms:title: 강화군 사 권경인등이 무명을 지고 공덕리로 와 주인을
dcterms:abstract: ○강화군 사 권경인등이 무명을 지고 공덕리로 와 주인을 뎡고 히더니 진고 사 명부지 김가가 그주인에 차져와 무명을 사자 고 지고 문안으로 드러가자  권씨가 무명을 지고 라가다가 김가의 이 슈샹을 보고 크게 의혹야 아니 판단야 도로지고 공덕리로 나갓더니 그 잇튼날 졍치셔라  자이 권가를 차져와 감가의 왓던 말을며 무명을 사자고  권가가 무명을 가지고 졍가를 라 진고로가 집에 드러간즉 젼날 보던 김가가 잇 그 김가의 말이 이집이 내집이라 무명 흥졍을 후 돈은 모레 차즈라 권씨가 허락고 돈차즐 긔한을 그 집에셔 기다리  권가와 치 올나온 사도 무명을 갓다가 그 김가의게 마자 흥졍 고 다른 곳에셔 무명 판돈 일량지 맛기고 밤을 지 더니 그 잇튼날 아츰에 졍가가 문득 놀나 톄며 김가가 밤에 무명과 돈을 가지고 도망엿다 거 권가등의 말이 이집이 김가의 집인 무 걱졍이 잇스리오  졍가이 대로여 말기를 이집이 내 집인 엇지 김가의 집이라 뇨 즉 권가 말이 어졔 그가 김가의 말을며 무명을 사자야 지고 드러와 김가를 만나 삼인이 치 안고 말 김가가 이집이 졔집이라고 며 말 엇지 못드른쳬 다가 지금와셔 억지에 말을니  우리 아모커나 무명갑시나 차졋스면 졍가의 집이고 김가의 집이고 상관 것 업스니 어셔 무명갑시나 라 즉 졍가가 아니 주겟다야 권가등이 한셩 판쇼에 졍엿더니 김가가 업슴으로 권가가 낙숑 권가가 억울 을 익의지못 야  고등으로 졍원엿다 더라

dcterms:title: 銓考槩意
dcterms:abstract: ●銓考槩意  內部에셔 勅奏判任官의 任用令을 得聞니 其槪要가 如左니  一  勅任官은 所管主務大臣이 議政  府會議 經야 上奏奉勅고  一  奏任官은 所管主務大臣이 議政  府大臣을 經야 上奏裁可고一  判任官은 所管主務大臣이 專行  叙任  勅任官資格은 曾經勅任 者나 奏  任三等以上滿三年繼續勤務 者  와 但奏任二年以上繼續勤務야  事務의 通鍊 者를 該官廳에 陞任  을 得  奏任官은 曾經奏任一年 者와 判  任官三年以上繼續勤務야 才藝  卓絕 者와 但外國語를 通鍊야  外交에 嫺熟 者  判任官은 銓考所合格證書가 有  者와 曾經判任一年以上繼續在勤  者와 高等學校及同等以上으로 學  部大臣이 認 官公私立學校卒  業證書가 有 者와 雇員五年以上  에 繼續勤務야 事務에 鍊達 者一  特異 學術技能이 有 者 右  記資格을 勿拘고 奏任은 議政府  會議를 經고 判任官은 銓考所銓  衡을 經이라一  勅奏判任官任用의 不合 者  公貨百圜以上犯逋者와 刑役에 處  야 特赦 者라도 刑期一分을 過  치못 者와 免懲戒 者라도 一年  을 經치못 者라더라

dcterms:title: It is reported that the cost of the Spanish war in Cuba from February 1895 to December
dcterms:abstract: It is reported that the cost of the Spanish war in Cuba from February 1895 to December 1897 is estimated by official figures at $240.000.000. Nor does this reckon the $40,000,000 arrears from the Cuban treasury due to Spain, making a net loss to the monarchy of $280,000,000. Whether or not ◈ has been overbearing to her Pearl of the Antilles or little Cuba in the wrong, this is a sad misuse of money. Spain has lost almost all that her brave explorers found for her. As in those days, when she recalled De Soto from the Mississippi because he found no gold, so throughout the following years she has been a constant seeker for riches. Had she spent half the fortune to alleviate the condition of her people and given them light, she would to-day find a contentment which gold has never brought

dcterms:title: 雲校寄函
dcterms:abstract: 雲山普通學校敎員양大孫씨가 本社에 寄函여 曰僕은 遐土一物이라 學古가 素無고 向新이 又暗야 面舊背新에 自不能容於世나 曾遊학舍야 從事於敎育者ㅣ 有年于玆矣라 每閱新報라가 某道某郡에 有志人士가 學校을 設立고 敎育에 熱心이란 報道을 接야 心竊慕之야 未甞不再三圭復에 向人說道나 繼又視之者 有其終也라 有志者ㅣ 事豈不成이리오만 我韓習俗이 形式是好야 有其名無其實者ㅣ 慮或不無니 美種의 不熟과 豈異리오 以此興念에 悲喜가 交至러니 昌城郡守金相範氏가 學校를 廣設고 敎育에 熱心을 聞고 向於休學之暇에 全往該郡야 一次巡覽즉 學校之壯과 敎育之盛이 實所欽服에 悲縮喜全이라 其校況槪要가 如左니邑邸에 民家은 不過數百餘戶而學校 三個所가 有니 一曰其昌義塾이니 位置 在該郡明倫堂而琉璃牕時計冊床踞床等汁物이 一層鮮明에 無所不具고 敎授程度 師範이오 學徒 五十餘人인 一境內학力이 有 聰俊을 擇入얏고 二曰月新學校니 位置 在西門外訓鍊場而校具 下同고 敎科 晝夜學이 有니 晝학은 漢文日語筭術地誌歷史等이오 夜學은 法律日語二科인대 학徒가 六十餘人이오 三曰昌一학校니 位置 在南門內前官齋而校具는 上同고 程度 小학敬니 普通各科가 具備고 學徒 七十餘人이라 此 邑內大略而其他各面학校가 八面에 十個所인대 學徒緫數가 五百餘人이러라 好善은 同情而不可以獨觀其美故로 畧擧實況야 敢玆仰布라엿더라

dcterms:title: PRINCE HENRY IN TOKYO
dcterms:abstract: PRINCE HENRY IN TOKYO.TOKYO, June 30. Prince Henry, accompanied by Admiral Kataoka, Colonel Tanmura and Mr.Nagasaki the Committee appointed for the recoption of the Prince, left the Sheba Detached Palace at 8 o´clock this morning and visited the barracks of the 3rd In fantry Regiment at Azabu and afterwards witnessed the drilling of the 4th Infantry Regiment of Imperial Guards at the Aoyama Parade Ground. His Imperial Highness will inspect the Military Arsenal at Koishikawa to-morrow afternoon.Last night a dinner was given by the German Minister in bonour of Prance Henry. About eighty-were present, including the Captains of the Deutschland and Gefion and their officers, Marquis Yamagata, Viscount Aoki, Admiral Yamamoto, Baron Kawegn-chi, Drs. Baelz and Scribe, ＆c

dcterms:title: 凶徒被捉
dcterms:abstract: 雜報⊙(凶徒被捉)再昨日下午七時에 小安洞에셔 砲聲이 轟起 其響이 比前尤猛이라 警官과 巡檢과 兵丁들이 奔走往見즉 其門牌에 書기를 六統七戶 朴太緖家라 其形址를 更査즉 該家에셔 暴藥을 春搗製造다가 自起發火으로 二人은 被燒야 全身이 一黑塊를 成지라 巡檢들이 該藥臼一坐와 燒黑 二人을 警廳에 擔送얏더니 該二人은 因以致死고 其家에 在 韓光聖 朴民弘 李種南 李信在와 女人 七名을 捕縛야 該廳으로 押送고  李粲永爲名人이 壁帳에 隱避얏다가 詗察에 現露야 同爲押送얏다더라昨日警務使南命善氏가 內部에 報告기를 該家에셔 男女 幷十五人을 捕捉얏 其中 一人을 爲先訊問즉 姦狀이 已露無疑와 今將審辦이오며 其家의 所在藥物을 勢將搜探乃已이오나 現今 日本巡査 八名이 方來把守기로 搜索이 實難이오니 外部에 照會와 日公舘에 轉照야 該巡査를 一幷撤去야 搜探에 便케 야 달나 얏더라當夜에 戒嚴이 緊密야 警廳에셔 街壁에 揭示기를 二更以後 人民의 來往을 禁止라 으로 巡檢과 負商들은 各大官家와 各坊曲에 巡行嚴察고 警廳에 兵丁을 派送야 保護더라

dcterms:title: 宮廷錄事
dcterms:abstract: 官  報●（宮廷錄事）奉  天承運皇帝詔曰朕承  祖宗丕基夙夜祗懼罔敢暇逸迺者  天眷東顧邦命維新誕有中恢之業制作閎備法度煥然配藝祖于天追尊  四世之廟百禮旣洽靡不畢擧夫豈朕否德所以致此上荷  皇天之靈下賴臣庶之力而適値多難興邦之會矣今疆圉寧謐年糓小康而民生困療迄未蘇矣國計艱絀轉益甚矣處憂溢目萬幾叢脞儀文典禮有未遑論而  東宮知年之誠孝以朕今歲將躋五旬乃欲備文而飾慶陳章苦懇凡三至而只許上告下布繼又率百官庭講觸冐雪寒歷日不止朕念其勞瘁憫其旨意亦以與情之不可抑遏不獲己幷許  加上追上之典而名者實之賓也所可急於時者宜其汲汲於務實而徒尙浮文朕心不取愈切愧焉至如豊豫之擧尤非此時所可行肆於屢懇而不之許也恭惟  明憲淑敬睿仁正穆弘聖章純貞徽莊昭端禧粹顯懿獻太后徽猷懿範允邁古先  天申用休茀祿川至今年寳齡七旬寔遵彝章議定  進號之節玆於月正元日祗告郊廟朕亦臨殿受賀溥覃恩澤所有合行事宜開列于後  一歷代帝王陵寢有毁壞者該觀察察明具報于該部以爲修葺  一嶽鎭海瀆神室傾頹者該地方官報明修葺以致誠敬  一朝延高爵厚祿優養臣僚原欲其盡忠爲國國之安危全係官僚之貪廉官若奸貪則賄賂肆行庸惡倖進無功冐賞吏胥舞文小民被害政之紊亂實始于此自本年陰曆正月初一日以後凡在京大小各衙門及外觀察府尹郡守鎭衞隊將官並吏胥皀役等但有貪賂枉法剝削小民者照例治罪不在赦前  一文蔭武朝官七品以下各加一階  一懷琦抱璞隱逸之士堪爲時用及武略出衆膽力過人者凡所在該觀察據實擧薦該部覆核徵聘以便擢用  一人命至重歷代皆有三覆奏之條而失出之罰輕於失入凡問刑官員母執己見母循賄曯務在得情  一謀叛强盗殺人通奸騙財竊盗六犯外各减一等  一各道民人孤貧殘疾無人養贍者該地方官加意撫恤母令失所    各處小民有衣食不給流移他鄕者詔書到日各還本土有事務要加意撫恤俾務生業仍免雜差一年  一天下之本農爲重各府州縣果有勤於耕種務本力作者地方官不時加奬以示皷勵一恩詔有免荒地有免水旱災傷有免民間額賦不可再有拖欠或輸納已完地方官別項支用或侵入私槖以致小民虛受拖欠之名悉與豁免  一各處無主荒地該地方官察明呈報觀察再加察勘果無虛捏旣與題免錢粮其地仍招民開墾  一內外文蔭武各官有因公詿誤已免本官者該部奏免懲戒  一各道道路橋梁有毁壞者着地方官査明修理以利行旅  一詔內各欵欵地方各官俱要實心奉行務使恩澤及民不負朕憫念元兀至意如沿習古套徒以虛文塞責該觀察不能覺察叅奏着內部一並糾察重處  於戲遇慶同樂歛時錫民視如傷保如孩俾無怨咨萬有春千有秋共享仁壽布告天下咸使聞知  光武四年陰曆正月初一日

dcterms:title: 美醫慈善
dcterms:abstract: ●解散決議 再昨日午前에 李軍部大臣과 長谷川大將이 統監邸에 集合야 現存 韓國軍隊를 解散기로 決定 結果로 同日午後九時四十分에 李総理와 趙法相이 參內上奏 後에 詔勅을 頒佈하얏더라●軍心不穩 軍隊解散詔勅은 別項과 如하거니와 此詔勅이 발布되기 前日부터 日兵은 戒嚴이 尤甚얏고 韓國大臣들은 豫션避亂얏대 詔勅이 頒布되면 軍心이 不穩야 將有事焉이러라●只留一대 京城在韓國軍대 시衛第一聯대 第二第三大대 及第二聯第一第二第三大와 及砲兵工兵騎兵각中대 及混成大대인대 其中에셔 시衛第一聯대第二大대만 置고 其餘 盡皆散케 하얏더라●長谷召集 昨日上午七時부터 長谷川大將은 韓國時原任將以下 召集하야 嚴重히 訓諭얏다더라●參領自刎 昨曉에 軍部大臣이 대將領官을 召入야 今日下午八時에 각대兵丁에 武裝을 解除고 訓鍊院에셔 解散式을 擧行케 라 하매 各대將官이 或承命며 或激憤더니 中有一人야 失聲放哭 後에 自刎以殉하니 其人은 卽시衛一대大대長朴星煥氏더라●誘兵出營 昨日午前十時에 대兵丁을 訓鍊院에 集合고 解散式을 擧行하기로 決定고 대將官이 士卒을 向하야 訓鍊院으로 往야 空手運動고 誘引야 相率而去대 日兵이 擁團而去더라●乘空占奪 典洞侍衞三대營와 貞洞宿衞所 昨日上午八時量에 日兵이가 占入고 新門內徵上一隊 同九時量에 占入하얏난 韓兵을 散기로 日兵은 再昨夜부터 豫션准備얏다 韓國각대將官이 兵사 指揮야 出營기 待야 其空營을 占奪얏더라●兵器收容 昨曉七時에 長谷川大將官邸에 韓國大대長以上將校十餘名이 出席얏 李軍部大臣이 別項詔勅을 示고 訓諭 後에 韓國將校 각歸自대하고 日本將校 傳騎와 同伴야 八時부터 각대의 兵器를 收容기에 着手얏더라●一대擧兵 侍衛第一聯第一大長朴星煥씨가 時局을 憤歎하야 稱病不勤이러니 解散命令을 受고 憤氣를 不勝하야 自刎殉節 其部下兵가 將官의 自刀을 聞하고 大驚하여 曰此 日本之所爲라 고 擧皆憤激야 遂히 擧兵에 至얏더라●日兵占營 侍衞一대가 擾動을 見고 第二聯대第一大대도 呼應며 合兵야 南大門外日本兵舍를 襲擊하려  日兵이 應戰야 發砲고 昨日上午十一時에 兩대兵營을 日兵이 全就占領얏더라●門外小戰 待衞一대의셔 脫營 兵卒一小대 昨朝九時頃에 南門外에 出야 日本兵丁及巡査와 約半時間交戰하얏대 南門을 警備든 日兵은 盡히 南門棲上에셔 小銃을 放야 韓兵을 射擊얏대 兩便의 死傷이 互相甚多다더라●又一小戰 其後十時에 韓兵이 更起야 日兵을 攻戰랴  매 日兵이 更히 應戰야 機關砲를 使用하 城內城外에 砲聲이 震動더라●日婦捉兵 시衛兩大隊 訓鍊院解散式에 參列을 拒絶고 日兵과 交戰지 半時餘에 衆寡不敵야 乃終에 四散奔走야 人民家屋에에 隱避하얏뎨 日兵에 搜索은 姑고 日人女子지 人家에 擅入搜索야 日憲兵派出所에 抱留더라●韓日死傷 兩便死傷은 未詳나 現場에 出見한 者의 報道를 據則彼此間積屍相枕하야 難可詳考라 하며 日人探報 據한則 日兵은 中隊長一人이 死고 其他下士卒의 死傷이 三십餘名이오 韓兵은 將校五人下士四拾名이 死하고 三十名이 負傷고 捕虜가 五拾餘名이라 얏더라●日兵設砲 日本兵丁數三십名이 昨日上午二時부터 鍾路에 速射砲 掛置고 戒嚴이 比前嚴密다더라●日兵突入 侍衛兵가 四散逃避 日兵이 韓兵 捕捉다 고 南門內外人家에 突入하야 四面搜索다더라●最終敬禮 昨日上午十時부터 兵丁을 訓鍊院에 召集고 解散式을 擧行 日兵이 四面環圍하야 堅如鐵筒고 韓國尉官을 困在該心야 大將이 曉諭後◈將卒이 互相作別敬禮 施고 將校 姑爲待命이고 下 八十圜式兵卒은 一年以上勤務者 五十圜式一年以下者 貳십五圜式頒賜얏더라●韓兵揮淚 昨日訓鍊院에셔 解散 韓兵들이 恩賜◈受고 出來하야 憤氣 不勝야 或者 紙錢裂碎고 或者 衣冠諸俱 買며 落淚者多더라●官派日 각軍대샤官은 日本에 派送야 武官學校에 入學卒業케 다더라●朝市撤閉 再昨夜以來로 城內人心이 更히 不穩야 昨朝부터 人民이 警겁야 避難出城者多며 朝市 撤廢며 店門을 緊閉얏더라●禁門難通 慶◈宮內閣의 一般官吏가 昨日上午九時頃에 仕進랴다가 布덕門을 任意로 出入치 못야 還歸其第 人로 或有하다더라●來徃不便 漢城內 坊曲에 把守 日本兵丁이 총立으로 人民來往의 不便 事이 多다더라

dcterms:title: 韓國之山은 不可不禿이오 其人民은 不可不懶惰
dcterms:abstract: 此 昨年에 遊歷韓國던 日本法學博士梅謙次郞氏의 所述이라以前에 相應 文明에 達얏던 韓國이 何故로 今日에 如斯히 退步 者乎아 余의 所見으로도 政治의 腐敗가 卽其主要 原因이라노라 余甞韓國의 禿山에 就야 按考건대 韓國의 山이 決코 荒廢거시아니라 以前에 相當히 繁茂 森林으로 掩蔽 事實이 無疑오 其造林事業等도 稍히 發達되얏스며 森林保護法도 相當히 開明되얏슨則其山林이 今日지 赤禿에 至은 全혀 近頃의 事러라近來韓國政府 山林保護等을 度外에 視아니라 其已存 樹木도 亂伐고 且亂伐 後에 後日를 顧計이 更無야 其森林에 成長與否를 自然에 放任이며 又若干에 山林을 有 者ㅣ 有더도 其一私人의 所有와 共有 勿論고 政府가 卽時徵發命令을 發야 此를 採伐고 其外에 採伐 費用지 山林所有者에게 負擔시기 事가 徃徃有之니 然則幾年間積苦盡勞고셔 及其稍稍成長야 用林에 適當 時에 當야 政府에게 見奪것보다 寗히 自然에 放任만 不如다는 思想이 各人腦裏에 深入것은 自然 理勢라 故로 從來에 森林이 益益荒廢에 至이오 未完

dcterms:title: 英法親交와 俄法同盟
dcterms:abstract: ⊙英法親交와 俄法同盟現今 英法의 關係가 漸次 親合하랴 이 近來 外交界에 特別한 現象이라 然하나 決코 此를 偶然한 事로 謂치 못 것이 法國에셔 英國에 輸入하난 物品은 每年十二億元에 達하되 英國에셔 法國에 輸出하난 物品은 八億元에 不過한 則 英法兩國間에 一朝外交가 破裂하면 法國은 一箇年에 十二億元을 損失  아니라 英人이 每年巴里에 來하야 消費하난 八億元의 收入도 杜絶되야 一箇年에 二十億元을 損失지라 故로 法國實業家 等은 每常英國과 親交를 保하랴 하고 且法國은 共和政治가 建設以來로 王朝黨이 新政府를 屢次顚覆하랴 하더니 今日에 至하야난 其基礎가 鞏固하야 大統領이 無等光榮과 威嚴을 有에 至하얏난 曾時 歐洲帝王이 微賤에 起身 法國大統領과 握手기를 不肯다가 今에난 該感情이 全히 一掃되고 俄英兩帝가 訪問며 伊王도 亦訪問코져 하난지라 形勢가 如此함으로 法國이 海外에 困難한 問題를 惹起하난 것은 甚히 愚騃한 쥴노 信하난 듯한 法國國會의 五百餘 議員中에난 每常過激히 論하야 曰 英國을 討하야 屈辱을 洗하자 하며 又曰 德國과 開戰야 宿怨을 報자 며 又曰 라인 河난 天然히 德法間에 設定한 國境이라 하나 此論은 元來 政府의 議論될 것이 아니오 且法廷은 海外領土經營에 多事하야 英國과 開戰할 餘地가 未有할지라 故로 此等事를 仔細히 觀察하면 英法親交난 法國에셔 不可不 採用 政策이니 不足怪異오 俄法關係에 至하야난 外交界에셔 信하난 것과 如히 有力치 못 듯 元來 俄法同盟은 三國同盟及東方問題의 解決에 對야 成立된 것이니 極東의 外交問題난 曾時 俄法同盟을 因하야 解決되랴난 形勢가 非無얏스되 日英同盟이 成立 以後난 多히 日英同盟을 因야 解決계 되얏다더라
